‘‘I fancy he (Swamiji's brother) would easily dispute possession of the Math with the monks themselves, if he saw a chance. I may be wrong ... .’’

33. efveJesefolee keâe 15 efmelecyej 1902 keâe he$e~

keâe ieg®-oeefÙelJe mJeÙeb mJeeceerpeer Éeje ner Gve ueesieeW keâes meeQhee ieÙee nw~ Fme efpeccesoejer keâe efveJee&n keâjvee GveceW mes ØelÙeskeâ keâe keâle&JÙe nw~ Fme keâle&JÙe kesâ heeueve Éeje ner mJeeceerpeer keâer Øeerefle Dee|pele keâjvee mecYeJe nw~ meejoevevo peer ves keâne efkeâ Jes mJeeceerpeer Éeje ceveesveerle meefÛeJe nQ Deewj peevevee Ûeene efkeâ keâewve keâewve Gvekeâer meneÙelee keâjves keâes FÛÚgkeâ nw, keâewve keâewve mebIe kesâ keâeÙe& ceW DeelceefveÙeesie keâjves keâes lewÙeej nw Deewj keâewve keâewve Ssmee nw pees kesâJeue lehemÙee ceW peerJeve efyeleevee Ûeenlee nw~ GvneWves mJeÙeb Yeer heeBÛe Je<eeX lekeâ mebIe keâe keâeÙe& keâjves keâe JeÛeve efoÙee~ Gvekesâ Fme Dee£eve hej DeefOekeâebMe mebvÙeemeer Gvekeâer meneÙelee keâjves keâes Deeies yeÌ{ DeeÙes~ Fme Øekeâej Iej keâes meBYeeueves kesâ yeeo meejoevevo peer mJeeceerpeer Éeje DeejyOe keâeÙe& keâes hetje keâjves nsleg De«emej ngS~34

meeOeg-yeÇÿeÛeeefjÙeeW kesâ DeYeeJeeW leLee efMekeâeÙeleeW hej efJeÛeej keâjves kesâ yeeo ce" keâer JÙeJemLee ceW LeesÌ[e LeesÌ[e heefjJele&ve efkeâÙee ieÙee~ mecYeJele: Fmeer meceÙe ‘yeÇome& ÙetefveÙeve’35 keâes yevo keâj efoÙee ieÙee~ Fve meejer yeeleeW keâer metÛevee Øeehle nesves hej legjerÙeevevo peer ves Deheves 26 ceeÛe& 1903 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘DeeMee keâjlee ntB efkeâ veÙes yevoesyemle mes meejer efJeefOe-JÙeJemLee DeÛÚer nes peeÙeieer~ Deewj mJeeceerpeer keâer efJeefOe-JÙeJemLee mes DeÛÚer Deewj keâewvemeer efJeefOe-JÙeJemLee nes mekeâleer nw? cesje lees Ssmee efJeÕeeme nw efkeâ Deheves Yeerlej ner megOejves keâer FÛÚe leLee mebkeâuhe ve nesves hej, efJeefOe-JÙeJemLee mes kegâÚ efJeMes<e ueeYe veneR nes mekeâlee~ Demleg, mJeeceerpeer meyekesâ keâuÙeeCe nsleg DeLekeâ ØeÙeeme keâjkesâ kegâÚ yevee ieÙes nQ, Gvekeâe Ùen ØeÙeeme efJeHeâue ve nes peeÙe, keâeÙe-ceve-JeeCeer mes ØeYeg kesâ mece#e cesjer Ùener ØeeLe&vee nw~’’ Fme Øekeâej mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo leLee mJeeceer meejoevevo ves mJeeceerpeer kesâ hejJeleea keâeue keâer mecemÙeeDeeW keâe meceeOeeve keâjkesâ mebIe keâes Fmekesâ ue#Ùe keâer Deesj De«emej keâjeÙee Lee~

nce henues ner keân DeeÙes nQ efkeâ peeheeve ceW ØemleeefJele Skeâ meccesueve ceW Yeeie uesves nsleg mJeeceerpeer keâes Deeceb$eCe efceuee Lee~ kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ keâer FÛÚevegmeej mJeeceerpeer ves Gmes mJeerkeâej lees keâj efueÙee, hejvleg Jemlegle: Gvekeâe peevee mecYeJe ve nes mekeâe Lee~ mJeeceerpeer kesâ DeYeeJe ceW meccesueve kesâ DeeÙeespekeâeW ves mJeeceer meejoevevo keâes yegueevee Ûeene~ meceeÛeej DeeÙee efkeâ Ùen meccesueve keäÙeesšes ceW 1903 F&. kesâ DeØewue ceW yegueeves keâer lewÙeejer Ûeue jner nw~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves ieg®YeeF& mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo keâes efueKee,36 ‘‘efHeâj mes peeheeve ceW keâeb«esme nesves keâer yeele efveef§ele nes jner nw~ ueielee nw efkeâ ("ekegâj kesâ) GlmeJe kesâ yeeo ner cegPes peevee nesiee~’’

152 mJeeceer meejoevevo

Gvekeâer FÛÚe Leer efkeâ Jes peeheeve neskeâj Decesefjkeâe peeÙeWies37 Deewj Yeefieveer ef›eâeqmšve Éeje efvee|cele veejer-efMe#eeÙeleve kesâ efueS JeneB DeLe&meb«en keâjWies~ DeeefKejkeâej Ùen meccesueve nes veneR mekeâe~ ¤me kesâ meeLe peeheeve kesâ jepeveweflekeâ mecyevOeeW ceW efiejeJeš ner mecYeJele: Fmekeâe cegKÙe keâejCe Lee~ Fme Øekeâej mJeeceer meejoevevo keâe efHeâj efJeosMe-ieceve veneR nes mekeâe~

osMeJeeefmeÙeeW leLee efJeMes<ekeâj ÙegJeeJeie& ceW peeiejCe kesâ ue#eCe osKekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves 4 Deòetâyej, 1902 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘It is one of those rare cases in history, where the sacred seal of death

made the cause to be consecrated and accepted more widely than when the worker was living! The young specially, are showing such eagerness to accept him as ideal!’’ ÙegJekeâeW keâe Dee«en leLee Glmeen osKekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo Deeies yeÌ{ DeeÙes Les~ Deheves ›eâceMe: yeÌ{les ngS GòejoeefÙelJe kesâ yeeJepeto GvneWves veJepee«ele ÙegJeeMeefòeâ kesâ mebie"ve nsleg Deefleefjòeâ keâeÙe&metÛeer mJeerkeâej keâer~ GvneWves Deheveer cece&mheMeea Yee<ee ceW mJeeceerpeer keâe Decej mevosMe ÙegJeeJeie& kesâ mece#e Øemlegle efkeâÙee~

23 Deiemle 1902 keâes keâuekeâòes ceW DeeÙeesefpele mJeeceerpeer keâer mce=eflemeYee keâes efveefceòe yeveekeâj JeneB keâer ‘efJeJeskeâevevo meefceefle’ keâe pevce ngDee~ 13 efmelecyej keâes mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâer DeOÙe#elee ceW meefceefle keâe henuee DeefOeJesMeve ngDee~ Fme meYee ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ JÙeeKÙeeve keâe efJe<eÙe Lee, ‘Ideas of the Swamiji and how can they be brought into practice.’ kegâÚ efoveeW yeeo ceõeme mes DeeÙes jeceke=â<Ceevevo ves Yeer 25 Deòetâyej keâes Fme meefceefle Éeje DeeÙeesefpele Skeâ meYee ceW Yee<eCe efoÙee~ Fmekesâ yeeo mJeeceer meejoevevo ves JeneB ieerlee hej keâ#eeSB uesveer DeejcYe keâer~ Ùen keâ#ee Øeefle MeefveJeej keâes ngDee keâjleer Leer~ Fme Øekeâuhe keâer meHeâuelee kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW GvneWves Deheves 13 HeâjJejer (1903) kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘The Vivekananda Society is putting on well and my lectures on Geeta have proved attractive.’’ Fmekesâ henues kesâ Skeâ jefJeJeej keâes meefceefle Éeje DeeÙeesefpele Skeâ meYee ceW Yeer mJeeceer meejoevevo yeesues Les~ Fme meYee keâer DeOÙe#elee ‘FeqC[Ùeve efcejj’ he$e kesâ mecheeokeâ vejsvõveeLe mesve ves keâer Leer~ Fme meYee kesâ Deheves DevegYeJe keâe JeCe&ve keâjles ngSmJeeceer meejoevevo ves Skeâ he$e Yeer efueKee Lee~38

37. mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer ye=nled Yetefcekeâe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW DeeMeeJeeoer efveJesefolee ves Deheves 19-2-1903 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘And my view is that he will visit everywhere, and to him will afterwards fall the placing of youngmen all over the world.’

38. GvneWves efueKee Lee, ‘‘I gave them a thorough slashing on the point on which Swamiji spoke many times that we must hold our views in Religion and not sit at the feet of the foreigners to learn it. Of course, the President differed with me and it did not please him very much being a Theosophist, but the audience liked it all the same. ’’

1903 F&. keâer peveJejer ceW ‘yeeieyeepeej efJeJeskeâevevo meefceefle’ keâe ie"ve ngDee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo leLee [e@. MeefMeYet<eCe Iees<e ÙeLee›eâce Gmekesâ DeOÙe#e leLee meefÛeJe efveJee&efÛele ngS~

ÙegJee efJeÅeee|LeÙeeW kesâ keâeHeâer keâeue mes Ûeues Dee jns DeYeeJe keâes otj keâjves kesâ efueS 64/1, ceÚgDeeyeepeej mš^erš hej eqmLele efkeâjeÙes kesâ Skeâ yeÌ[s YeJeve ceW 18 petve 1903 keâes ‘efJeJeskeâevevo mce=efle-ceeqvoj’ veecekeâ Skeâ Úe$eeJeeme DeejcYe efkeâÙee ieÙee~39 mJeeceer meeqÛÛeoevevo (yetÌ{s yeeyee) Fmekesâ DeJewleefvekeâ megheeEjšWC[Wš leLee Gheos°e ngS~ mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ 11 DeØewue 1904 kesâ he$e ceW Fme mce=efle-ceeqvoj keâer YeeJeer heefjkeâuhevee ØemHegâefšle nes G"er nw~ GvneWves mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo keâes efueKee Lee, ‘‘The Vivekananda Memorial Home has done good work last year and I am sure its influence will grow in time. But there is no fund to carry it on. So I am determined to raise funds and see the work through second year and try to make it a permanent institution, if possible. Sister Nivedita40 is helping me a great deal in it.’’ 17 peveJejer 1904 keâes mce=efle-ceeqvoj ceW mJeeceerpeer keâe pevceeslmeJe ceveeÙee ieÙee~ meYee keâer DeOÙe#elee mJeeceer meejoevevo ves keâer~ meKeejece ieCesMe osGmkeâj, ‘Fbef[Ùeve vesMeve’ he$e kesâ mecheeokeâ ßeer veiesvõveeLe Iees<e Deeefo kesâ JÙeeKÙeeve ngS~ kegâÚ keâeue yeeo cekeâeve-ceeefuekeâ Úe$eeJeeme keâes DevÙe$e mLeeveevleefjle keâjves keâes lebie keâjves ueiee~ og:Ke keâer yeele Ùen nw efkeâ efkeâjeÙes keâe Skeâ GheÙegòeâ YeJeve ve efceue heeves kesâ keâejCe Ùen ueeskeâefØeÙe Úe$eeJeeme yevo keâj osvee heÌ[e~

Ùeogieesheeue cegKeesheeOÙeeÙe keâer mce=eflekeâLee mes %eele neslee nw efkeâ FvneR efoveeW mJeeceer meejoevevo ves ‘DevegMeerueve meefceefle’ ceW Yeer ieerlee keâer keâ#eeSB ueer LeeR~41

ÙegJee Úe$eeW kesâ Ûeefj$e-ie"ve nsleg efMe#ee kesâ Deefleefjòeâ mJeeceer meejoevevo Gve efoveeW

39. mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves 3/7/1903 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee nw, ‘‘I have been busy in starting a Students' boarding in Calcutta. It has been fairly started now under the name of the Vivekananda Memorial Home.’’

    1. Fme mce=efle-ceeqvoj kesâ meeLe efveJesefolee kesâ mecyevOe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW, JeneB kesâ Skeâ DevlesJeemeer ØeceLejbpeve heeue ves megvoj efÛe$eCe efkeâÙee nw~ efveJesefolee yeerÛe yeerÛe ceW mce=efle-ceeqvoj ceW DeeÙee keâjleer LeeR~ Skeâ efove DehejeÖ kesâ meceÙe efveJesefolee neue ner ceW Kejeros ieÙes 6' X 7' kesâ YeejleJe<e& kesâ Skeâ vekeäMes kesâ meeLe JeneB DeeÙeeR~ mJeeceer meeqÛÛeoevevo keâer Devegceefle ueskeâj vekeäMes keâes oerJeej mes ueškeâe efoÙee ieÙee~ leoghejevle efveJesefolee ves Úe$eeW keâes Skeâ Göerhekeâ Yee<eCe efoÙee~ Yee<eCe kesâ Devle ceW GvneWves keâne, ‘Wherever you go, your Mother's portrait which you see here, let occupy the centre of your heart and Her thoughts crowd your memory.’
    2. Devle ceW meyeves efveJesefolee kesâ meeLe ‘Jevosceelejced’ keâe GÛÛeejCe efkeâÙee~’’ (ueeskeâceelee efveJesefolee, Mebkeâjer Øemeeo yemeg, KeC[ 2, he==. 134-39)
  1. Deefmele kegâceej yevÅeesheeOÙeeÙe Deeefo Éeje mecheeefole ‘efJeÕeefJeJeskeâ’, he==. 253

154 mJeeceer meejoevevo

veejer-efMe#ee kesâ #es$e ceW Yeer efJeMes<e GÅeesieer ngS Les~ 20 HeâjJejer 1903 keâes GvneWves mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo keâes efueKee, ‘‘Skeâ yeele Deewj nw, efpemes ceQ henues ner legcnW yelee Ûegkeâe ntB

– ceeleepeer kesâ efueS Skeâ mLeeve Deewj ceefnueeDeeW kesâ efueS Skeâ keâeÙe& DeejcYe keâjvee~ Fmekeâer Yeer megefJeOee nesves pee jner nw~ ßeerceleer yegue ves hegve: Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW DeeÕeemeve efoÙee nw~’’ mJeeceerpeer keâer efMe<Ùee Yeefieveer ef›eâeqmšve keâer meneÙelee mes efveJesefolee efJeÅeeueÙe ceW veiej-Œeer efJeYeeie keâe GodIeešve efkeâÙee ieÙee Lee~42 26 Deòetâyej keâes DevleŠhegj ceW jnvesJeeueer ceefnueeDeeW kesâ meccegKe mJeeceer meejoevevo ves YeieJeodieerlee hej Skeâ Yee<eCe efoÙee Lee~ ßeerceleer yegue Yeer GmeceW GheeqmLele LeeR Deewj GvneWves nejceesefveÙece yepeekeâj meyekeâe mJeeiele efkeâÙee Lee~ 2 veJecyej mes mehleen ceW oes efove hegjŒeer-efMe#ee keâer keâ#eeSB Ûeueleer jneR~ efomecyej ceW Fme efveŠMegukeâ efJeÅeeueÙe kesâ efMe#eee|LeÙeeW keâer mebKÙee 40 lekeâ hengBÛe ieÙeer Leer~ efyevee keâesF& Megukeâ efueS GvnW IeesÌ[sieeÌ[er ceW efJeÅeeueÙe ueeÙee peelee Deewj efHeâj Jeeheme Yeer hengBÛee efoÙee peelee~ Fme keâeÙe& ceW SCšeueer kesâ Ghesve osJe keâer ieeÌ[er keâe GheÙeesie efkeâÙee peelee Lee~ Fme efJeÅeeueÙe ceW efmeueeF&, yeBieuee leLee Deb«espeer Yee<ee Deewj ieerlee keâer efMe#ee oer peeleer Leer~ efmeueeF& keâe mlej keâeHeâer TBÛee Lee~ ceespes yeveeves keâer oes ceMeerveW Yeer peeheeve mes ceBieJeeF& ieÙeer LeeR~ Fmekesâ GösMÙe kesâ mecyevOe ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo ves efueKee Lee, ‘‘The poor women must be taught something by which they will

be able to earn something and be independent. We are directing our efforts to that end.’’ Ùeesieerve-ceeB hegjeqŒeÙeeW keâes Oece&efMe#ee efoÙee keâjleer LeeR~43 mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer efvejvlej he=‰hees<ekeâlee mes yeeefuekeâeDeeW kesâ efueS efveJesefolee efJeÅeeueÙe leLee JeÙemkeâ ceefnueeDeeW kesâ efueS veejer-efMe#ee keâer keâce&metÛeer mece=æ nesleer jner~44

1904 F&. ceW ‘jeceke=â<Ce-meefceefle DeveeLe YeC[ej’ veece mes Skeâ DeveeLeeßece mLeeefhele ngDee Lee~ Fmekeâe GösMÙe Lee DeveeLe yeeuekeâeW kesâ Yeespeve leLee efMe#ee Deeefo keâer JÙeJemLee keâjvee Deewj efnvot efJeOeJeeDeeW leLee Je=æ-Je=æeDeeW keâes Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee Øeoeve keâjvee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo Fmekesâ mLeeÙeer DeOÙe#e efveJee&efÛele ngS Les~ meomÙeeW kesâ keâjyeæ DevegjesOe hej 1918

  1. Fmekeâe efJemle==le efJeJejCe ‘jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve keâe DevleŠhegj ØeÛeej’ Meer<e&keâ mes ‘GodyeesOeve’ kesâ 5JeW Je<e& ceW he=. 605-6 hej ØekeâeefMele ngDee Lee~
  2. efveJesefolee ves Deheves 26/11/1902 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee efkeâ Deieueer MeefveJeej keâer mebOÙee keâes mJeeceer meejoevevo ÛeC[er-hegjeCe mes keâLee megveeÙeWies leLee ceeB keâe veeceieeve keâjWies~
  3. efveJesefolee keâer ce=lÙeg ngF& 1911 F&. ceW~ ØeLece efJeÕeÙegæ DeejcYe nesves hej pece&ve-Decesefjkeâer ef›eâeqmšve keâes mJeosMe ueewš peevee heÌ[e Lee~ Gme meceÙe Yeefieveer megOeerje efJeÅeeueÙe keâe heefjÛeeueve keâjleer LeeR~ GvneWves mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer meneÙelee mes ‘ceele=-ceeqvoj’ kesâ veece mes (Jele&ceeve ceW meejoe-ceeqvoj) keâceea ceefnueeDeeW leLee yeeefuekeâeDeeW kesâ efueS Deeßece efJeYeeie Meg¤ efkeâÙee~ ØeOeevele: mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ ØeÙeemeeW mes ner 1918 F&. ceW Ùen efJeÅeeueÙe jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve mes mebÙegòeâ nes ieÙee~ leYeer mes Deheves osnlÙeeie kesâ hetJe& lekeâ mJeeceer meejoevevo ner Fmekesâ meefÛeJe jns~ (efveJesefolee yeeefuekeâe efJeÅeeueÙe heef$ekeâe, 1966)

F&. ceW ‘YeC[ej’ keâes jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve ceW meeqcceefuele keâj efueÙee ieÙee Lee~45

Decesefjkeâe ceW ØeÛeej-keâeÙe& nsleg mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo kesâ mLeeve hej mJeeceer ef$eiegCeeleerleevevo Ûegves ieÙes~ GvneWves ‘GodyeesOeve’ heef$ekeâe kesâ ØeejcYe mes ner ÛelegLe& Je<e& kesâ keâee|lekeâ Debkeâ lekeâ keâer hetjer efpeccesoejer meBYeeueer Leer~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheveer efJeosMeer JesMeYet<ee keâe kegâÚ DebMe GvnW os efoÙee, leeefkeâ Meg¤ ceW ner GvnW keâesF& keâ° ve nes~ 1902 F&. kesâ 27 efmelecyej keâes mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo, mJeeceer meejoevevo leLee Deewj Yeer keâF& ueesieeW ves neJeÌ[e mšsMeve peekeâj GvnW efJeoeF& oer~ Jes ceõeme, keâesuecyees leLee peeheeve nesles ngS 2 peveJejer 1903 keâes kewâueerHeâese|veÙee hengBÛes~

leej mes meceeÛeej DeeÙee efkeâ 11 veJecyej 1902 keâes mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ efhelee efiejerMeÛevõ ves JeejeCemeer ceW osnlÙeeie keâj efoÙee nw~ Deheves menesoj meleerMeÛevõ keâes meeLe ueskeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo Deieues efove ner JeejeCemeer ieÙes Deewj Deheveer Meeskeâmevlehle ceelee keâes meeLe ueskeâj 15 veJecyej keâes keâuekeâòes ueewš DeeÙes~ Gmekesâ yeeo meceeÛeej DeeÙee efkeâ 26 veJecyej keâes F&ÕejÛevõ ves Deeqvlece meebme ueer nw~ ÛeeÛee F&ÕejÛevõ meejoevevo peer kesâ leb$emeeOevee kesâ ieg® Les~ meejoevevo Fve IešveeDeeW kesâ yeerÛe veerjJe õ°e kesâ meceeve Meevle jns~

"ekegâj kesâ pÙes‰lece mebvÙeemeer-efMe<Ùe mJeeceer DeÉwleevevo keâer yeeBÙeer DeeBKe ceW ceesefleÙeeefyevo nes ieÙee Lee~ meejoevevo peer kesâ Thej Gvekeâer Deheej DeemLee Leer~ meejoevevo peer ves GvnW keâuekeâòes ues peekeâj efJeMes<e%e mes peeBÛe keâjeÙeer~ 11 efomecyej keâes Gvekesâ DeeBKe keâer MeuÙe-efkeÇâÙee ngF&~ DeÉwleevevo peer mJemLe neskeâj ce" ueewš DeeÙes~46

ßeerÙegle mesefJeÙej keâer ce=lÙeg kesâ yeeo ßeerceleer mesefJeÙej47 ceeÙeeJeleer kesâ DeÉwleeßece keâer Yetefce leLee YeJeveeW keâer mLeeÙeer keâevetveer JÙeJemLee keâjves keâes JÙe«e LeeR~ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo leLee mJeeceer meejoevevo ves "ekegâj kesâ Jekeâerue-Yeòeâ heušt keâj mes meueen-ceMeJeje efkeâÙee~ leovegmeej ßeerceleer mesefJeÙej mJeeceer mJe¤heevevo48 kesâ meeLe Gme heneÌ[er DebÛeue mes veerÛes Glej DeeÙeer LeeR~ Gme meceÙe yesuetÌ[ ce" ceW keâesF& DeefleefLe-YeJeve veneR Lee~ ce" keâer peceerve hej lecyet ieeÌ[keâj ßeerceleer mesefJeÙej leLee Yeefieveer ef›eâeqmšve kesâ ce"Jeeme keâer JÙeJemLee keâer ieÙeer Leer~ ßeerceleer mesefJeÙej ves ceeÙeeJeleer Deeßece keâer mecemle Ûeue leLee DeÛeue mecheefòe Skeâ veÙes š^mšer-ceC[ue keâes meeQhe efoÙee~ ßeerjeceke=â<Ce keâe pevceeslmeJe osKeves kesâ yeeo 1 DeØewue 1903 keâes ßeerceleer mesefJeÙej

156 mJeeceer meejoevevo

Jeeheme ceeÙeeJeleer Ûeueer ieÙeeR~

mJeeceer meejoevevo ßeerceleer yegue keâes ceeB kesâ meceeve ßeæe keâjles Les~ mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ efJeMes<e Deeceb$eCe hej Jes 10 petve (1903) keâes keâuekeâòee DeeÙeeR~ hejvleg peeheeve mes Deeles meceÙe Jes yeerceej heÌ[ ieÙeer LeeR~ mJeemLÙe ceW LeesÌ[e megOeej nesves hej GvneWves efveJesefolee leLee ef›eâeqmšve kesâ meeLe oee|peeEueie peekeâj efveJeeme efkeâÙee Lee~ pegueeF& kesâ ceOÙe ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo Yeer JeneB peekeâj mehleen Yej kesâ efueS Gve ueesieeW kesâ meeLe efceues Les~ Fmeer yeej ßeerceleer yegue ves Depevlee leLee Sueesje keâer efÛe$ekeâuee keâe heefjoMe&ve efkeâÙee Lee~ 14 veJecyej keâes yecyeF& mes Jes mJeosMe kesâ efueS jJeevee ngFË~49 efveJesefolee Yeer GvnW efJeoe keâjves kesâ efueS yecyeF& DeeÙeer LeeR~ YeejleJe<e& keâer Gvekeâer Ùen leermejer Ùee$ee Leer~50 Fmekesâ HeâuemJe¤he YeejleJe<e& kesâ meeLe Gvekeâe mecyevOe Ieefve‰ nes G"e Lee~ mJeeceerpeer kesâ DeeoMeeX mes DevegØeeefCele efJeefYeVe mesJeecetuekeâ keâeÙeeX kesâ Øeefle Gvekeâer menevegYetefle leLee Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee ves meejoevevo peer keâes keâce&Ùe%e kesâ efJemleej ceW meneÙelee Øeoeve keâer Leer~ Fmekesâ Deefleefjòeâ meejoevevo peer keâF& yeej Deee|Lekeâ leLee ØeMeemeefvekeâ ceeceueeW ceW Yeer Fve yegefæceleer ceefnuee keâer meueen efueÙee keâjles Les~

mJeeceerpeer keâer GheeqmLeefle ceW ner iebiee kesâ efkeâveejs lešyevOe yeveeves keâe keâeÙe& Meg¤ ngDee Lee, leLeeefhe DeLee&YeeJe kesâ keâejCe Gmes hetje keâjvee mecYeJe veneR nes mekeâe Lee~51 yeeo ceW efiejerMe yeeyet kesâ GÅeesie mes keäueeefmekeâ efLeÙesšj ceW Skeâ yesefveefHeâš veeFš keâe DeeÙeespeve ngDee, efpememes 800 ®heÙes Skeâ$e ngS~ 1903 F&. kesâ ßeerjeceke=â<Ce pevceeslmeJe kesâ yeeo Fmeer jeefMe mes lešyevOe keâe keâeÙe& hegve: DeejcYe efkeâÙee ieÙee~ 2 DeØewue (1903) keâes mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo kesâ veece efueKes mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ he$e mes %eele neslee nw efkeâ leerve mehleen kesâ Yeerlej Ùen keâeÙe& hetje nes peeÙeiee~ Fmekesâ yeeo ner mJeeceerpeer kesâ mce=efle-ceeqvoj keâe efvecee&Ce-keâeÙe& DeejcYe nes peeÙeiee~ hejvleg Keso keâer yeele Ùen nw efkeâ DeLee&YeeJe kesâ keâejCe Gmes DeejcYe veneR efkeâÙee pee mekeâe~

efØeÙe mJeeceerpeer keâer efJejn-JÙeLee mes heerefÌ[le leLee lelkeâeueerve IešveeDeeW kesâ DeeIeele mes Lekeâkeâj mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo ves kegâÚ keâeue leerLe&-oMe&ve leLee lehemÙee ceW efyeleeves keâe mebkeâuhe efkeâÙee~ leovegmeej 1903 F&. kesâ petve kesâ ceOÙe ceW Jes JeejeCemeer ieÙes~ mJeeceer megyeesOeevevo leLee yeÇÿeÛeejer %eeve Gvekesâ mebieer ngS Les~ ieg®YeeF& mJeeceer efMeJeevevo kesâ meeLe kegâÚ efove JeejeCemeer

  1. Yeefieveer efveJesefolee keâe 14/11/1903 keâe he$e~
  2. efÉleerÙe yeej Jes mecYeJele: 1902 F&. kesâ HeâjJejer ceW DeeÙeer LeeR Deewj keâuekeâòes kesâ Skeâ nesšue ceW "njer LeeR~ ceeÛe& kesâ cenerves ceW kegâÚ efove GvneWves yesuetÌ[ ce" ceW lecyet ueieekeâj efveJeeme efkeâÙee Lee~ efveJesefolee Gvekeâer mebefieveer LeeR~ 17 DeØewue (1902) keâes GvneWves Fme osMe mes ØemLeeve efkeâÙee Lee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves 29/3/1902 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘Mrs. Bull is with us for a short visit.’’
  3. lešyevOe keâe veÙee keâeÙe& DeejcYe ngDee Lee 29 ceeÛe& 1902 keâes; LeesÌ[e De«emej nesves kesâ yeeo DeLee&YeeJe kesâ keâejCe Fmes mLeefiele keâj efoÙee ieÙee Lee~

kesâ DeÉwleeßece ceW efyeleeves kesâ Ghejevle Jes ›eâceMe: keâveKeue, Je=voeJeve leLee Fueeneyeeo ieÙes~ ØelÙeskeâ mLeeve hej GvneWves keâeHeâer meceÙe pehe-OÙeeve ceW efyeleeÙes~ Je=voeJeve ceW mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo Deewj Fueeneyeeo ceW mJeeceer efJe%eeveevevo kesâ mebie Yeer GvneWves kegâÚ keâeue efyeleeÙee~ Ùen heefj›eâcee meceehle keâjkesâ Jes Gme Je<e& kesâ efomecyej ceW yesuetÌ[ ce" ueewš DeeÙes~

menpe ner Ùen ØeMve G"lee nw efkeâ Gme meceÙe mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ Mejerj-ceve keâer keäÙee DeJemLee Leer? Fme efJe<eÙe ceW efkeâmeer keâuhevee keâes ØeßeÙe ve oskeâj meejoevevo peer Éeje 17 efomecyej 1903 keâes ßeerceleer yeÇeGve kesâ veece efueKes he$e kesâ Skeâ DebMe keâer Deesj Âef°heele efkeâÙee pee mekeâlee nw~ GvneWves efueKee Lee, ‘‘The passing away of Swami Vivekananda has left a void, which will never be fulfilled, and added to it the responsibility of the work here, which has increased tenfold since – have compelled me to reserve and direct none of my energies in other directions.’’

Fme he$e ceW Gvekeâer nleeMee leLee efJe<eeo keâe YeeJe DeefYeJÙeòeâ nes G"ves kesâ yeeJepeto Gme meceÙe keâeÙe&#es$e ceW Gvekesâ Ûeefj$e ceW DeocÙe Meefòeâ keâe ØeekeâšŸe osKeves ceW DeeÙee Lee~ mJeeceerpeer keâer cenemeceeefOe kesâ Ghejevle ÙegJekeâeW ceW DeYetlehetJe& Glmeen leLee Göerhevee osKekeâj, mJeeceerpeer keâer YeeJeOeeje kesâ ØeÛeej keâer JeOe&ceeve DeeJeMÙekeâlee keâes hetje keâjves kesâ efueS meejoevevo peer ves mJeÙeb keâes mecee|hele keâj [euee Lee~ DeeueesÛÙe keâeue ceW "ekegâj-mJeeceerpeer keâer YeeJeOeeje-ØeÛeej kesâ efveefceòe meejoevevo peer ceW pewmee meyeue vesle=lJe osKeves ceW DeeÙee Lee, Jewmee mJeeceerpeer kesâ efkeâmeer DevÙe ieg®YeeF& Ùee efMe<Ùe ceW Âef°ieesÛej veneR ngDee~52 meejoevevo peer keâer DeelceyeesOe Éeje leer#Ceerke=âle efJeÛeejjeefMe, keâce&o#elee, YeeJemebÛeej keâer #ecelee, efvekeâš leLee otj kesâ ueesieeW kesâ Øeefle menevegYetefle leLee Øesce ves Gvekesâ vesle=lJe keâes heefjheg° efkeâÙee Lee~

mJeosMe efpelevee veneR, lees Yeer efJeosMe ceW Deewj efJeMes<ekeâj Decesefjkeâe ceW Jesoevle-ØeÛeej keâer DeeJeMÙekeâlee ceW efvejvlej Je=efæ nesleer pee jner Leer~ Fme DeeJeMÙekeâlee keâes hetje keâjves kesâ efueS 1904 F&. kesâ veJecyej ceW mJeeceer meeqÛÛeoevevo (efÉleerÙe) ef$eiegCeeleerleevevo peer keâer meneÙelee keâjves mewvøeâebefmemkeâes kesâ efueS jJeevee ngS~53 vÙegÙeeke&â kesâ ØeÛeej-keâeÙe& ceW mJeeceer DeYesoevevo keâer meneÙelee keâjves kesâ efueS mJeeceer efvece&ueevevo keâes Yespee ieÙee~

1904 F&. ceW ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ pevceeslmeJe kesâ yeeo mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo menmee keâeHeâer DemJemLe nes ieÙes Les~ Gvekesâ peerJeve lekeâ kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW mebMeÙe GlheVe nes ieÙee Lee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves 22 peveJejer 1905 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee nw, ‘‘jeKeeue cenejepe mecØeefle efmecegueleuee ceW ueieYeie leerve mehleen efyeleekeâj ueewš DeeÙes nQ~ Gvekeâe mJeemLÙe henues keâer Dehes#ee "erkeâ nw~ Fme yeej Ketye yeerceej nes ieÙes Les~ "erkeâ nesves keâer DeeMee ØeeÙe: Útš Ûegkeâer Leer~’’ ueewš Deeves kesâ

  1. efveJesefolee kesâ ØeÛeej keâer heæefle leLee Oeeje efYeVe efoMee ceW ØeJeeefnle ngF& Leer~
  2. Ùes 1910 F&. keâer peveJejer ceW mJeosMe ueewš DeeÙes Les~

158 mJeeceer meejoevevo

yeeo mes Skeâ lejn keâe veeeqmlekeâlee keâe YeeJe54 Gvekesâ ceve hej DeefOekeâej pecee yew"e Lee~ Fmemes GvnW yeÌ[er yesÛewveer keâe DevegYeJe nes jne Lee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ meeLe hegjerOeece ceW peekeâj kegâÚ efove efveJeeme keâjves kesâ yeeo Gvekesâ Gme YeeJe keâe GheMece ngDee~ Fve mecemle IešveeDeeW kesâ oewjeve yeÇÿeevevo peer kesâ DevleŠkeâjCe ceW Skeâ efJeješd heefjJele&ve DeeÙee~ Jes ceevees meJe&oe ner Skeâ YeeJepeieled ceW efJeÛejCe efkeâÙee keâjles jnles Les~ keâecekeâepe kesâ PebPešeW ceW Deye Jes ØelÙe#e ¤he mes efuehle nesvee veneR Ûeenles Les~ Fmekesâ HeâuemJe¤he mJeeceer Øesceevevo Deewj yeeo ceW mJeeceer efMeJeevevo ce" kesâ keâeÙeeX keâer JÙeJemLee meBYeeueles Les~ keâuekeâòes leLee DevÙe MeeKee-kesâvõeW kesâ mebÛeeueve keâe GòejoeefÙelJe mJeeceer meejoevevo Jenve keâjles Les~ hejvleg meyekesâ Thej Les mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo Deewj meejs cenòJehetCe& keâeÙe& Gvemes meueen kesâ yeeo ner efkeâÙes peeles Les~

mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo Éeje keâeÙe& kesâ ØelÙe#e GòejoeefÙelJe mes cegòeâ nes peeves kesâ yeeo keâecekeâepe keâer meejer mecemÙeeDeeW ves ceevees mJeeceer meejoevevo keâes Iesj efueÙee Deewj Fmemes keâeHeâer peefšuelee Yeer GlheVe nes ieÙeer Leer~ ce" keâer DeLe&-JÙeJemLee keâer efpeccesoejer mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo hej Leer~ leerve Je<e& kesâ efueS mJeeceer meeqÛÛeoevevo (yetÌ{s yeeyee) ves Ùen GòejoeefÙelJe mJeerkeâej efkeâÙee~ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo kesâ keâce&#es$e mes efKemekeâ peeves mes mJeeceer meejoevevo efkeâlevee efJeÛeefuele DevegYeJe keâj jns Les, Fme efJe<eÙe ceW Gvekesâ efvecveefueefKele he$eeW mes kegâÚ OeejCee keâer pee mekeâleer nw~ 21 veJecyej 1905 keâes GvneWves efueKee Lee, ‘‘jepee keâer DemJemLelee kesâ meceÙe mes ner ce" kesâ mecemle efJe<eÙeeW ceW ieÌ[yeÌ[er Ûeue jner nw~ yengle efoveeW mes efnmeeye efueKevee yeekeâer Lee~ Gmes hetje keâjves kesâ yeeo osKeves ceW DeeÙee efkeâ ce" keâer DeeÙe mes DeefOekeâ KeÛe& ngDee nw Deewj $e+Ce nes ieÙee nw~ ... jepee keâer yeerceejer kesâ yeeo mes meeje Yeej cesjs ner keâvOeeW hej Dee heÌ[e nw~’’ DeOÙe#e mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâe meeje GòejoeefÙelJe, ÙeneB lekeâ efkeâ Gvekeâe cenòJehetCe& he$e-JÙeJenej Yeer mJeeceer meejoevevo keâes ner meBYeeuevee heÌ[lee Lee~ ÙeLee, mewvøeâebefmemkeâes keâer Jesoevle-meefceefle kesâ ØeyevOekeâeW ves yesuetÌ[ ce" kesâ mebÛeeuekeâeW mes DeeJesove efkeâÙee efkeâ mJeeceer ef$eiegCeeleerleevevo keâes JeneB mes efkeâmeer Yeer neuele ceW mLeeveevleefjle ve efkeâÙee peeÙe~ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo kesâ nmlee#ej kesâ meeLe Gòej Fme Øekeâej Yespee ieÙee, ‘‘You seem to be afraid –out of love to-wards Swami Trigunatita – lest we recall him from there to work in other fields. Please let me assure you that no other thought is further from our minds than this.’’ [sÌ{ Je<e& yeeo 27 petve 1905 keâes GvneWves kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ keâes efueKee Lee, ‘‘... the whole of the Math responsibilities have virtually fallen on me; for the Swami Brahmananda has not become his former self again, after the terrible illness about two years ago.’’

ØeMeemeefvekeâ JÙeJemLee ceW Fme efJehegue heefjJele&ve kesâ yeeo mJeeceer meejoevevo keâes ner meejs

54. ‘yeÇÿeevevo-Ûeefjle’ (yeBieuee «ebLe), ØeLece meb., he==. 215-16

DeeBOeer-letHeâeve Pesueves heÌ[les Les~ hej DeeJeMÙekeâlee-yeesOe nesles ner Jes mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo mes GheosMe Deeefo meneÙelee kesâ efueS ØeeLe&vee keâj yew"les~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ve kesâJeue Gvekesâ Øeefle Yeefòeâßeæe keâjles Les, Jejved Gvekeâer ‘jepe’yegefæ hej efveYe&j keâjles Les~ oes-leerve Â°evle Øemlegle nQ~

‘GodyeesOeve’ YeJeve mes 24 HeâjJejer 1913 keâes GvneWves mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâes efueKee – hetpeveerÙe cenejepe,

keâue ßeerceelee "kegâjeveer peÙejeceyeešer Ûeueer ieÙeeR~ ... cegPes DeeMee Leer efkeâ legcnejs ÙeneB Deeves hej mJeeceerpeer kesâ JemeerÙeleveeces mes mecyeeqvOele oes efjueerpe-he$eeW hej nmlee#ej nes peeÙeiee~ hejvleg Ssmee nes veneR mekeâe~ Deeieeceer jefJeJeej keâes cesje hegjer peevee efveOee&efjle nw~ keäÙeeWefkeâ Mejerj Deewj Gmemes yeÌ{keâj ceve DelÙevle keäueevle nw~ Fmekesâ Thej DelÙevle heerÌ[eoeÙeer Jeelejesie kesâ keâejCe cenerves ceW Skeâ yeej ceQ Ûeueves-efHeâjves keâer Meefòeâ mes jefnle nes peelee ntB~ De°ceer ceW efove Jeele kesâ keâejCe cesjs yeeBÙes heeBJe keâe DeBiet"e DeÛeue nes ieÙee Lee, DeYeer lekeâ Jen "erkeâ veneR ngDee nw – petles veneR henve heelee Deewj efHeâj ueBieÌ[ekeâj Yeer Ûeuelee ntB~ ... Demleg, hegjer peeves kesâ hetJe& ner Ûeens pewmes Yeer nes, ceQves efve§eÙe keâj efueÙee nw efkeâ Skeâ efove Decesefjkeâer keâeQefmeue kesâ heeme peekeâj ceQ Gve oesveeW keâeiepeeleeW hej nmlee#ej keâj otBiee~ Gmes keâjves kesâ hetJe& ceQ peevevee Ûeenlee ntB efkeâ Jewmee keâjves ceW legcnejer menceefle nw Ùee veneR~ Fme efJe<eÙe ceW ceQ Deheveer yegefæ keâes KeÛe& efkeâÙes efyevee, legce pewmee Yeer keânesies Jewmee ner keâjvee Ûeenlee ntB~ keäÙeeWefkeâ Fleves efove yegefæ ueieeves kesâ yeeo Yeer Deye lekeâ kegâÚ Heâue veneR efceuee~ DeleSJe he$eesòej MeerIeÇ osvee Deewj Fme ceeceues ceW pees kegâÚ keâjvee nes, metefÛele keâjvee~ ...

ØeCele

oeme Mejled

hegve§e – mJeeceerpeer kesâ JemeerÙeleveeces kesâ Øeesyesš Deeefo kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW meejoe cenejepe mes Deepe ner Ùen he$e efceuee~

efÉleerÙe Â°evle~ Fmeer Je<e& kesâ Devle ceW Skeâ DevÙe mecemÙee osKeves ceW DeeÙeer~ ‘ßeerjeceke=â<Ce-JeÛeveece=le’ «evLe keâe efnvoer DevegJeeo ceeÙeeJeleer kesâ DeÉwleeßece mes ØekeâeefMele keâjves keâe efveCe&Ùe efueÙee ieÙee Lee~ hejvleg ßeer ‘ce’ ves kegâÚ Ssmeer MeleX jKeeR, pees ce" kesâ mebÛeeuekeâeW keâes mJeerkeâeÙe& veneR ueie jner LeeR~ ßeer ‘ce’ meyekesâ efueS ßeæsÙe JÙeefòeâ Les~ Fme keâejCe mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Fme mebJesoveMeerue efJe<eÙe ceW Deeqvlece efveCe&Ùe kesâ efueS JeejeCemeer ceW mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâes efueKe Yespee~

160 mJeeceer meejoevevo

GodyeesOeve kesâ ØeyevOekeâeW Éeje efJe›eâÙe keâer JÙeJemLee keâer peeÙe~ efyenejer yeeyet ves yeejcyeej he$e efueKekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo mes Fmekesâ efueS DevegjesOe efkeâÙee~ legjerÙeevevo peer ves Yeer Gvemes DevegjesOe keâjles ngS efueKee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Fme ceeceues ceW mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo kesâ meeLe ÛeÛee& keâer~ oesveeW Fme yeele hej mencele ngS efkeâ GodyeesOeve kesâ ØeyevOekeâeW Éeje Fme hegmlekeâ keâes mJeerkeâej keâjvee GefÛele veneR nesiee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Ún ÙegefòeâÙeeB oMee&les ngS ieg®YeeF& legjerÙeevevo keâes efueKee efkeâ keäÙeeW efyenejer yeeyet keâer hegmlekeâ keâes mJeerkeâej keâjvee GefÛele veneR nw Deewj meeLe ner he$e ceW Ùen Yeer peesÌ[ efoÙee, ‘‘ßeercenejepe ves legcnW mecePeeles ngS he$e efueKeves keâes keâne nw, Fme keâejCe Ùen yeele efueKeveer heÌ[er~’’

Â°evleeW keâer mebKÙee ceW Je=efæ ve keâjles ngS Deye nce efYeVe Øekeâej keâer Ssmeer Skeâ DevÙe yengÛee|Ûele heefjeqmLeefle keâe GuuesKe keâjWies, efpemes Skeâ DeeoMe& vecetvee keâne pee mekeâlee nw~ JeejeCemeer kesâ mesJeeßece ceW mebÛeeueve keâer ieÌ[yeÌ[er Deewj mesJeeßece leLee DeÉwleeßece kesâ meeOeg-keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ yeerÛe ceveesceeefuevÙe keâer Je=efæ nesleer pee jner Leer~ meceeÛeej heekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo ceewkesâ hej peekeâj heefjeqmLeefle keâes mecePeves kesâ efueS 25 veJecyej 1919 keâes JeejeCemeer pee hengBÛes~ Gvekesâ meeLe meevÙeeue ceneMeÙe, Ùeesieerve-ceeB leLee Skeâ mebvÙeemeer mesJekeâ Yeer ieÙes Les~ mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo Gve efoveeW mesJeeßece ceW ner efveJeeme keâj jns Les~ meejoevevo peer ves mJeeceer meeqÛÛeoevevo (yetÌ{s yeeyee) leLee mJeeceer DeÛeueevevo kesâ meeLe ÛeÛee& keâer Deewj menevegYetefle leLee OewÙe&hetJe&keâ mesJeeßece kesâ veÙes-hegjeves meeOeg-keâe|ceÙeeW keâer yeeleW megveer~ meye kegâÚ osKeves-megveves kesâ yeeo GvneWves mesJeeßece kesâ megÛee® Ûeeueve kesâ efueS Skeâ veJeerve efveÙeceeJeueer keâer jÛevee keâer~ Fme efJe<eÙe ceW mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo keâe meceLe&ve Øeehle keâjves kesâ yeeo GvneWves mecemle ØemleeefJele efveÙeceeW keâes meeOeg-keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ mece#e Øemlegle efkeâÙee~ Fme ØemleeefJele efJeefOe-JÙeJemLee keâer cetue yeele Ùen Leer efkeâ efkeâmeer JÙeefòeâ-efJeMes<e kesâ mLeeve hej, Skeâ meefceefle kesâ DeefOekeâebMe meomÙeeW kesâ celeevegmeej mesJeeßece keâe keâecekeâepe Ûeuesiee~ Fme JÙeJemLee keâe DeefOekeâebMe Yeeie mJeerkeâeÙe& nesves hej Yeer kegâÚ Jeefj‰ mebvÙeeefmeÙeeW ves peevevee Ûeene efkeâ Fme ØemleeJe kesâ mecyevOe ceW mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâe keäÙee cele nw~ efvejefYeceeve meejoevevo peer ves keâne, ‘‘"erkeâ keânles nes, peye nce meYeer cenejepe keâes ceeveles nQ, lees efHeâj Jes pees kegâÚ Yeer keânWies, Jener meJeexheefj nesiee~’’ meejoevevo peer ves Øeemebefiekeâ IešveeSB leLee meeOeg-keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ meeLe ngF& ÛeÛee& keâes efJemleej-hetJe&keâ efueKekeâj mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo kesâ meccegKe Øemlegle efkeâÙee~ Gòej ceW GvneWves hetjs DevleŠkeâjCe kesâ meeLe meejoevevo peer kesâ efveCe&Ùe keâe meceLe&ve efkeâÙee~ Deewj MeerIeÇ ner meYeer mebIeeOÙe#e kesâ cele mes DeJeiele nes ieÙes~

1 peveJejer 1920 keâe efove Lee~ meejoevevo peer ves Gme efove keâeHeâer keâeue lekeâ pehe-OÙeeve efkeâÙee~ Fmekesâ Ghejevle leKle hej yew"keâj GvneWves ÛeeÙe heer~ Gmeer meceÙe ce" kesâ Jeefj‰ mebvÙeemeerieCe Skeâ Skeâ keâj Gvekesâ keâcejs ceW GheeqmLele ngS~ cenejepe kesâ heeme yetÌ{s yeeyee leKle hej, Jeelejesie mes heerefÌ[le Ûevõ cenejepe kegâmeea hej Deewj DevÙe meYeer ueesie HeâMe& hej efyeÚs ngS DeemeveeW hej yew"s~ LeesÌ[er osj lekeâ Jeelee&ueehe keâjves kesâ yeeo mJeeceer meejoevevo ves menmee leKle mes Glejkeâj neLe peesÌ[s Deheves efMe<Ùe-mLeeveerÙe ueesieeW mes DevegjesOe efkeâÙee, ‘‘Deleerle ceW pees kegâÚ ngDee nw, Gmes Yetue peeDees~ "ekegâj-mJeeceerpeer kesâ keâeÙe& ceW Glejkeâj Úesšer-ceesšer yeeleeW keâes ueskeâj Deeheme ceW efleòeâlee keâer me=ef° cele keâjes~ legce ueesieeW mes neLe peesÌ[keâj keânlee ntB efkeâ legce ueesie Skeâ-otmejs hej efJeÕeeme keâjes Deewj ùoÙe mes Øesce keâjes~ leYeer osKeesies efkeâ mecemle mecemÙeeDeeW keâe meceeOeeve nes ieÙee nw~’’ ueiee efkeâ Jes YeeJeeJesie ceW Deewj kegâÚ yeesue veneR hee jns nQ~ Jes neLe peesÌ[keâj KeÌ[s jns~ meejoevevo peer kesâ JÙeefòeâlJe kesâ peeot mes meYeer DeefYeYetle Les~ keâefve‰ ueesieeW ves Skeâ Skeâ keâj cenejepe keâes ØeCeece efkeâÙee~ cenejepe ves DevÙe meYeer kesâ meeLe Ûevõ cenejepe keâe efceueve keâje efoÙee~ Deb«espeer veJeJe<e& kesâ Fme efceueveeslmeJe kesâ yeeo veÙeer JÙeJemLee kesâ Devegmeej keâecekeâepe DeejcYe ngDee~ oesveeW DeeßeceeW kesâ meeOegDeeW kesâ DevegjesOe hej mJeeceer meejoevevo mJeeceerpeer kesâ pevceeslmeJe ceW Yeeie uesves kesâ yeeo 20 peveJejer keâes keâuekeâòes ueewš DeeÙes~ 6 HeâjJejer keâes Jes meevÙeeue ceneMeÙe keâes meeLe ueskeâj YegJevesÕej ieÙes Deewj JeejeCemeer kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW meye kegâÚ yeÇÿeevevo peer keâes metefÛele efkeâÙee~ ome efove cenejepe keâe mebie keâjves kesâ yeeo 17 HeâjJejer keâes Jes GodyeesOeve keâeÙee&ueÙe ueewš DeeÙes~

JeejeCemeer ceW efJeJeeo«emle ueesie Gme meceÙe lees Meevle nes ieÙes, hejvleg kegâÚ keâeue kesâ Yeerlej ner Gvekesâ Devlej ceW heue jns DeMeevle YeeJe ves mesJeeßece kesâ heefjJesMe keâes hegve: keâšg leLee ogKeceÙe keâj [euee~ Denblee Deewj cecelee keâe keâeHeâer peesj Lee~ Gme PebPeeJeele ceW keâceeaieCe mebIe kesâ ceneved DeeoMe& keâes Yeer efJemce=le keâj yew"s~ efpeme meceÙe JeejeCemeer mes De®efÛekeâj mebJeeo Dee jns Les, Gmeer oewjeve ßeerceeB ves ueeruee-mebJejCe efkeâÙee Deewj mJeeceer DeodYegleevevo ves osnlÙeeie keâj efoÙee Lee~ efveJesefolee efJeÅeeueÙe keâer cetue keâceea Yeefieveer megOeerje keâer jsue-ogIe&švee ceW ce=lÙeg nes ieÙeer Leer, meejoevevo peer kesâ efÉleerÙe Úesšs YeeF& [e@. meleerMeÛevõ keâe ùoÙejesie mes osnevle nes ieÙee Lee Deewj henues Úesšs YeeF& Ûee®Ûevõ kesâ heg$e keâe ogIe&švee ceW ØeeCeevle nes ieÙee Lee~ mesJeeßece keâer heefjeqmLeefle hej efJeÛeej keâjves kesâ yeeo efÛevlee«emle meejoevevo peer yeuejece-YeJeve ceW mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo kesâ heeme ieÙes Deewj meejer yeeleeW mes GvnW DeJeiele keâjeles ngS Gvemes nmle#eshe keâe DevegjesOe efkeâÙee~ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo jepeer ngS~

20 peveJejer 1921 keâes mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo leLee mJeeceer meejoevevo JeejeCemeer hengBÛes~ Gvekesâ meeLe lesjn-Ûeewon meeOeg-yeÇÿeÛeejer Yeer ieÙes Les~ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâer GheeqmLeefle mes JeneB efvelÙeeslmeJe DeejcYe nes ieÙee~ Jes DeÉwleeßece ceW Deewj mJeeceer meejoevevo ue#ceer-efveJeeme ceW "njs Les~ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo, mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo Deewj mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ efceueve mes Ghejesòeâ mJeleŠmHetâle& efvelÙeeslmeJe DeeOÙeeeqlcekeâ YeeJe mes ceeqC[le nes G"e~ hetpee, pehe-OÙeeve, Yepeve, MeeŒehee" Deeefo ceW Jeefj‰ meeOegDeeW kesâ Glmeen leLee Göerhevee mes heefjJesMe ceOegceÙe nes G"e~

162 mJeeceer meejoevevo

30 peveJejer keâes mJeeceerpeer keâer pevceefleefLe keâe efove hetpee-nesce, pehe-OÙeeve Deeefo ceW yeerlee~ jele ceW mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo ves heQleerme Øeee|LeÙeeW keâes GoejleehetJe&keâ mebvÙeeme leLee yeÇÿeÛeÙe&-›ele ceW oeref#ele efkeâÙee~ 6 HeâjJejer keâes mJeeceerpeer kesâ meeJe&peefvekeâ GlmeJe ceW oefjõ-veejeÙeCeeW keâe Yeespeve ngDee~ DehejeÖ kesâ meceÙe mJeeceer meejoevevo ves DeÉwleeßece kesâ ØeebieCe ceW DeeÙeesefpele pevemeYee keâer DeOÙe#elee keâer~ Fme meYee ceW efØebefmeheue lespees eEmen, mJeeceer meJee&vevo leLee mJeeceer efveefKeueevevo kesâ JÙeeKÙeeve kesâ Ghejevle mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves DeefYeYee<eCe ceW mesJee-keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ mece#e mJeeceerpeer keâe DeeoMe& Øemlegle efkeâÙee~ GvneWves keâne, ‘‘DeocÙe keâce& kesâ yeerÛe Yeer iecYeerj ØeMeevle YeeJe mes Deheves DeeÛeej-JÙeJenej keâes hekeâÌ[s jKevee nesiee, pewmee efkeâ ÙeesiemLe ßeerYeieJeeve ves kegâ®#es$e kesâ YeÙebkeâj ueeskeâmebnej kesâ yeerÛe Yeer Øeoe|Mele efkeâÙee Lee~’’

cepes keâer yeele lees Ùen nw efkeâ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo ves Deeßece kesâ keâecekeâepe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW keâesF& yeele veneR keâner, mJeeceer meejoevevo Yeer Fme efJe<eÙe ceW ceewve jns~ meeOeg-yeÇÿeÛeeefjÙeeW ves Yeer Gve ueesieeW kesâ mece#e Gve meye yeeleeW keâe GuuesKe veneR efkeâÙee~ 10 HeâjJejer keâes mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo keâer pevceefleefLe yeÌ[s OetceOeece kesâ meeLe ceveeÙeer ieÙeer~ jele keâes Øeeflecee ceW keâeueerhetpee leLee nesce ngDee~ cenejepe ves Ûeej ueesieeW keâes mebvÙeeme efoÙee~ GveceW mes Skeâ Ûee® yeeyet keâe veece ngDee mJeeceer MegYeevevo~

Devle ceW osKee ieÙee efkeâ efJeJeeo«emle ueesieeW keâes Yeer yeesOe nesves ueiee efkeâ GveceW mes ØelÙeskeâ kesâ peerJeve keâe ue#Ùe YeieJelØeeeqhle nw~ JewjeiÙe keâer ØesjCee mes GveceW mes keâesF& keâesF& lehemÙee keâjves keâes efvekeâue heÌ[e~ Skeâ Je<e& hetJe& mJeeceer meejoevevo ves pees keâce&-JÙeJemLee DeejcYe keâer Leer, Jen DeyeeOe ieefle mes Ûeueves ueieer~ oesveeW DeeßeceeW kesâ DevlesJeeefmeÙeeW kesâ yeerÛe keâer efleòeâlee otj nes ieÙeer Deewj Gvekeâe mecheke&â menpe leLee mejme nes G"e~ Fme Øekeâej keâce&-mecemÙee keâe mecegefÛele meceeOeeve nesles osKekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo efMeJejeef$e kesâ yeeo leLee "ekegâj keâer efleefLehetpee kesâ hetJe& keâuekeâòes ueewš DeeÙes~ hejJeleea keâeue ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ cegKe mes megvee ieÙee Lee, ‘‘cenejepe (mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo) nceejs heefjÛeeuekeâ Les; ce"eOÙe#e heo keâer Meefòeâ mes veneR, yeequkeâ Jes Deheves Øesce keâer JeMeerkeâjCe-Meefòeâ kesâ Éeje nceeje heefjÛeeueve keâjles Les~’’55

Ghejesòeâ kegâÚ IešveeDeeW kesâ Éeje Ùen mecePee pee mekeâlee nw efkeâ mebIe-heefjÛeeueve kesâ ceeceues ceW keâcee&OÙe#e meejoevevo peer mebIeeOÙe#e mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo kesâ Thej efkeâleves efveYe&jMeerue Les; Fmeer Øekeâej nceves DevÙe$e56 Yeer Ssmeer ner Deveskeâ IešveeDeeW keâe GuuesKe efkeâÙee nw, efpeveceW menkeâceea mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ Thej yeÇÿeevevo peer keâer DeieeOe DeemLee mhe° heefjueef#ele nesleer nw~ efHeâj Fve mecemle IešveeDeeW kesâ Éeje Fve oesveeW kesâ yeerÛe keâe Deehemeer ceOegj mecheke&â Deeueesefkeâle nes G"e Lee~ jeceke=â<Ce mebIe kesâ heefjØes#Ùe ceW Fve oesveeW keâer Deehesef#ekeâ Yetefcekeâe kegâMee«eyegefæ

  1. yeÇÿeevevo-Ûeefjle, he==. 243
  2. õ°JÙe — uesKekeâ keâe yeBieuee ceW ‘yeÇÿeevevo-Ûeefjle’~

Yeefieveer efveJesefolee kesâ efÛevleve ceW DeefYeJÙeòeâ nes G"er Leer~ GvneWves efueKee Lee, ‘‘mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo DeOÙeelcekesâvõ leLee mebIeØeOeeve nQ Deewj mJeeceer meejoevevo mebie"keâ leLee GòejoeefÙelJe-Jeenkeâ nQ; Jes Úesšs-ceesšs keâeÙeeX ceW meerceeyeæ veneR nQ~57 uesefKekeâe kesâ cele kesâ Deeqvlece Yeeie kesâ meeLe nce mencele veneR nQ~ keäÙeeWefkeâ osKeves ceW Deelee nw efkeâ ce" leLee efceMeve kesâ mebie"keâ leLee efJeMeeue GòejoeefÙelJeeW kesâ Jeenkeâ neskeâj Yeer DeeJeMÙekeâleevegmeej mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Úesšsceesšs keâeÙeeX ceW Yeer ceveesefveÙeesie efkeâÙee nw~ Jes DemeneÙe Je=æe efJeOeJeeDeeW ceW mes ØelÙeskeâ kesâ hewmes hewmes keâe efnmeeye jKeles Les; jeOet, ceeketâ, ceCšer Deeefo kesâ Úesšs-ceesšs n"eW keâes Yeer hetje keâjles Les Deewj Úesšs-yeÌ[s Deveskeâ ueesieeW keâer yeerceejer kesâ meceÙe DeevevohetJe&keâ mesJee keâjles Les~ cetue yeele Ùen nw efkeâ mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo leLee mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ oes oMekeâJÙeeheer vesle=lJe ves jeceke=â<Ce mebIe kesâ Fefleneme kesâ Skeâ mJeCeexppJeue DeOÙeeÙe keâer jÛevee keâer Leer~

hegve: efJeÛeej keâjves hej nce osKe heeles nQ efkeâ mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer Deheveer mJeÙeb keâer Yetefcekeâe Yeer DelÙevle ceneved nw~ GvneWves ner Deheves ùoÙe, ceeqmle<keâ leLee yeengyeue mes ßeerjeceke=â<Ce-DeeoMe& keâe ¤heeÙeve efkeâÙee Lee; mebIe kesâ ØeeÙe: pevcekeâeue mes ner GvneWves DeefJeeqÛÚVe YeeJe mes Fmekeâer heefjÛeÙee& keâer Leer Deewj efHeâj Fmekesâ ceeie& kesâ keâCškeâeW keâes nšekeâj mebIe keâe DeyeeOe efJekeâeme megefveef§ele efkeâÙee Lee~ Gvekesâ ceneØeÙeeCe kesâ kegâÚ keâeue yeeo ner mebIe kesâ Deb«espeer cegKehe$e ‘Øeyegæ Yeejle’ kesâ mecheeokeâ ves "erkeâ ner efueKee Lee, ‘‘What the Ramakrishna Mission is today is largely due to Swami Saradananda.’’ mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer kegâMeuelee Deepe Yeer DelegueveerÙe nw~ mecheeokeâ ves Deewj Yeer efueKee Lee, ‘‘The Mission, though it derived its ideals and inspirations from other sources, owes its present articulate form mainly to the endeavours of the departed Swami. It is he who worked at it from its very inception, giving the ideals concrete forms, linking them to the problems of the passing years, till it reached its present advanced state of development.’’58

57. kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ kesâ veece 19/2/1910 keâes efueKes he$e keâe DebMe~

58. Prabudha Bharata, Vol. 32, No. 10, p. 436

164

Hegâuue Meleoue : mebIe¤heer ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ ‘YeejJeenkeâ’ (efÉleerÙe heJe&)

nceves osKee efkeâ 1904 F&. kesâ ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ pevce-ceneslmeJe kesâ yeeo mes mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ peerJeve ceW Skeâ DeØelÙeeefMele peefšue heefjeqmLeefle keâe GoÙe ngDee Lee~ Gme meceÙe lekeâ mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo vepejeW mes DeesPeue nes Ûegkesâ Les; mebIe kesâ heefjÛeeueve kesâ keâeÙe& ceW Gvekesâ ØecegKe Yeeieeroej mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo ØelÙe#e ¤he mes menÙeesie keâjves ceW DemeceLe& Les; efJeJeskeâevevoefJeÛeejOeeje kesâ cece&%e mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo keâce&#es$e ceW Glejves keâes DeefveÛÚgkeâ Les; efJeosMeeW ceW ØeÛeejkeâeÙe& ceW efvejle mJeeceer DeYesoevevo leLee mJeeceer ef$eiegCeeleerleevevo meneÙelee keâjves ceW DemeceLe& Les; efvehegCe keâceea mJeeceer jeceke=â<Ceevevo, mJeeceer DeKeC[evevo leLee mJeeceer efJe%eeveevevo Deheves Deheves keâce&mLeeveeW ceW JÙemle Les Deewj mJeeceer DeodYegleevevo meoe kesâ meceeve JewjeiÙe keâer meeOevee ceW [tyes ngS Les~ leLeeefhe Fmeer yeerÛe ßeerceeB leLee Gvekesâ ‘mebmeej’ keâe Yeer meeje GòejoeefÙelJe meejoevevo peer kesâ ner keâvOeeW hej Dee heÌ[e Lee~ Deewj keâesF& GheeÙe ve osKe, meejer heefjeqmLeefle hej efJeÛeej keâjles ngS mJeeceer meejoevevo Deheves mJeYeeJeefmeæ meenme leLee OewÙe& kesâ meeLe JeOe&ceeve leLee peefšue GòejoeefÙelJeeW keâe efveJee&n keâjves keâes De«emej ngS~ hejJeleea keâeue ceW GvnW GheosMe osles megvee ieÙee Lee, ‘‘keâesF& legcnejer meneÙelee ve keâjs, lees Yeer legcnW Dekesâues ner Ùen keâeÙe& keâjles ngS osnheeled keâj osvee nesiee – Ssmes lespe, meenme leLee F&ÕejefveYe&jlee kesâ meeLe keâeÙe& keâj mekeâes, lees keâjes~’’ Gvekeâe Dehevee peerJeve ner Gvekesâ Fme GheosMe keâe pJeuevle GoenjCe nw~ Fmeer YeeJe keâe DeeßeÙe ueskeâj Jes Deheves ieg® oeefÙelJe keâe heeueve keâjves keâes De«emej ngS Les~

Fme meceÙe mes ueskeâj peerJeve kesâ Devle lekeâ, megoerIe& lesF&me Je<eeX keâer Gvekesâ efve‰ehetCe& mebIemesJee-keâeue keâe efJeMues<eCe keâjves hej nce osKeles nQ efkeâ cegKÙele: leerve GheeoeveeW mes GvnW mecegefÛele ØesjCee Øeehle ngF& Leer~ Jes ßeerjeceke=â<Ce keâer Meefòeâ ceeB-meejoe keâer ØemeVelee hej efveYe&jMeerue nes G"s Les~ Fme efJeÕeeme keâes GvneWves peesjeW kesâ meeLe hekeâÌ[ jKee Lee efkeâ "ekegâj kesâ ØeefleefveefOe¤he Gvekesâ ceevemeheg$e mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo efmej hej eqmLele nQ~ oes hebKe leLee Skeâ hetBÚ keâe meneje ueskeâj ner he#eer DeekeâeMe ceW GÌ[lee nw~ Ghejesòeâ oes YeeJeeW kesâ hebKe Deewj mJeeceerpeer Éeje efveOee&efjle ßeerjeceke=â<Ce-DeeoMe& keâe hetBÚ kesâ ¤he ceW DeeßeÙe ueskeâj ner meejoevevo peer Deheves TBÛes ue#Ùe keâer Deesj De«emej ngS Les Deewj ceve-ØeeCe mes mebIe¤heer ßeerjeceke=â<Ce keâer mesJee keâer Leer~ Jes mebIe¤heer ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ ‘YeejJeenkeâ’ Les~

mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo kesâ ceneØeÙeeCe kesâ yeeo meejs osMe kesâ ueesieeW Deewj efJeMes<ekeâj le®CeeW ceW G"s nueÛeue ves yengle-mes ueesieeW keâes efJeeqmcele keâj efoÙee Lee~ heeBÛe Je<e& hetJe& keâesuecyees mes ueskeâj DeuceesÌ[e lekeâ GvnW ueskeâj efpeme Gvceeo keâer me=ef° ngF& Leer, Gmes Skeâ ueIeg meeceefÙekeâ GÛ½Jeeme ceevekeâj efJeJeskeâevevo-efJejesOeer efveef§evle nes ieÙes Les~ Deye Gve ueesieeW ves DeJeekedâ neskeâj osKee efkeâ efJeJeskeâevevo cejves kesâ yeeo ceevees hegve: peerefJele nes G"s nQ~1 ‘‘efJeJeskeâevevo Deheveer efÛej peveveer leLee Gvekeâer mevleeveeW keâer Deelcee ceW Deepe Yeer efÛejbpeerJeer nQ’’ – ßeerDejefJevo keâer Ùen JeeCeer melÙe ceW heefjCele ngF&~ YeejleJeeefmeÙeeW keâer Ûeslevee kesâ efJeefYeVe #es$eeW ceW veJepeeiejCe keâe mHegâjCe ngDee~ Fme peeiejCe ves DeocÙe Deb«espe mejkeâej keâes Yeer efÛevlee ceW [eue efoÙee Lee~

mJeeceerpeer kesâ ceneØeÙeeCe kesâ yeeo, Gvekeâer pevceefleefLe leLee Gmekesâ hejJeleea jefJeJeej keâes – oes efove ÛeuevesJeeuee pevceeslmeJe DeejcYe ngDee~ LeesÌ[s ner efoveeW ceW Fme GlmeJe keâer ueeskeâefØeÙelee efMeKej lekeâ pee hengBÛeer~ 1905 F&. ceW efpeme Øekeâej Gvekesâ pevceefleefLe-GlmeJe kesâ efove, Gmeer Øekeâej hejJeleea jefJeJeej keâes DeeÙeesefpele meeJe&peefvekeâ GlmeJe ceW nueÛeue ceÛe ieÙeer Leer~ 5 HeâjJejer keâes Devegeq‰le nesvesJeeues Fme keâeÙe&›eâce ceW vÙeeÙecete|le meejoeÛejCe efce$e, ØeeOÙeehekeâ peieoerMeÛevõ yeesme, keâefJe jJeervõveeLe "ekegâj, jeÙeyeneogj Ûegveerueeue yemeg, heeqC[le meleerMeÛevõ efJeÅeeYet<eCe Deeefo ieCÙeceevÙe ueesieeW ves Yeeie efueÙee Lee~ DeOÙe#e keâe Deemeve mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deuebke=âle efkeâÙee Lee~ hegueerve efyenejer efce$e Éeje ØeejeqcYekeâ ieerle kesâ Ghejevle mJeeceerpeer keâer jÛeveeDeeW mes hee" leLee DeeJe=efòe ngF&~ efiejerMeÛevõ Iees<e Éeje efueefKele ‘ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ meeLe efJeJeskeâevevo keâe mecyevOe’ efveyevOe keâe hee" nesves kesâ yeeo mJeeceer Megæevevo ves yeBieuee ceW ‘mJeeceerpeer keâer efMe#ee-ØeCeeueer’ hej Deewj Yeefieveer efveJesefolee ves Deb«espeer ceW ‘mJeeceerpeer keâe hee§eelÙe-osMeeW ceW keâeÙe&’ efJe<eÙe hej mHetâe|leoeÙeer JÙeeKÙeeve efoÙes~ megueefuele DeOÙe#eerÙe Yee<eCe kesâ Ghejevle efiejerMeÛevõ Éeje jefÛele leLee hegefueve efce$e Éeje ieeÙes ieÙes mJeeceerpeer-efJe<eÙekeâ oes ieerleeW kesâ meeLe pevceeslmeJe meceehle ngDee~2

mJeeceerpeer keâer cenemeceeefOe kesâ kegâÚ efoveeW yeeo mJeeceer Øesceevevo ves Deheves ØeJeemeer ieg®YeeF& DeYesoevevo keâes DevÙe meceeÛeejeW kesâ meeLe ner Ùen Yeer efueKee Lee, ‘‘efpeme mLeeve hej (mJeeceerpeer kesâ hetle Mejerj keâe) oen ngDee, JeneB Skeâ efMeJe-ceeqvoj leLee Gmekesâ meccegKe Skeâ veešŸeceeqvoj mLeeefhele keâjves keâer FÛÚe nw; LeesÌ[e-yengle ØeÙeeme Yeer Ûeue jne nw~ keâuekeâòes kesâ ueesie Yeer Skeâ mce=efle-meYee DeeÙeesefpele keâjves keâe ØeÙeeme keâj jns nQ~ ceõeme ceW Skeâ Ssmeer meYee nes Ûegkeâer nw, Oeve Yeer Skeâ$e ngDee nw~’’ Jewmes Oeve Deuhe ner Skeâ$e ngDee Lee~ keâuekeâòes ceW mce=efle-meYee keâe DeeÙeespeve ngDee Lee~ meceeefOe-mLeue hej Skeâ efJeMeeue efvecee&CekeâeÙe& keâer Ùeespevee

  1. efceMevejer heef$ekeâe ‘neJexmš Heâeru[’ ves (Deiemle, 1902 kesâ Debkeâ ceW) efueKee Lee, ‘‘efpevnW pevelee lespeer mes Yetueleer pee jner Leer, ce=lÙeg ves efHeâj mes GvneR keâer mce=efle keâes peiee efoÙee~’’ (efJeJeskeâevevo Dees mecekeâeueerve YeejleJe<e&, Mebkeâjer Øemeeo yemeg, KeC[ 6, he==. 1)

166 mJeeceer meejoevevo

yeveeÙeer ieÙeer, hejvleg Gmekesâ ¤heeÙeve ceW DeLee&YeeJe ner cegKÙe yeeOee efmeæ ngF&~ keâuekeâòes ceW LeesÌ[e-mee ner Oeve Skeâ$e nes mekeâe Lee~ oes Je<e& yeeo DeeueeeEmeiee hes®ceue ceõeme ceW GÅeesieer ngS Les,3 hejvleg Gvekesâ Éeje meb«eefnle Oeve keâe heefjceeCe Yeer Deuhe ner Lee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Decesefjkeâe ceW eqmLele mJeeceer DeYesoevevo keâes efueKee Lee, ‘‘Gvekesâ meceeefOe-mLeue hej Skeâ ceeqvoj yeveeves keâer yeele nes jner nw~ Ùeefo Gvekesâ efce$eieCe Fme efJe<eÙe ceW kegâÚ meneÙelee keâj mekeWâ, lees Yespevee~’’ Fve meejs ØeÙeemeeW mes Yeer heÙee&hle Oeve pegš veneR mekeâe Lee~

FOej mJeeceer efJe%eeveevevo kesâ efveoxMeve ceW yeveer Ùeespevee kesâ Devegmeej mce=efle-ceeqvoj keâe efvecee&Ce-keâeÙe& 10 ceeÛe& 1907 keâes DeejcYe ngDee Lee~ ØemleeefJele YeJeve keâer veeRJe jKeer ieÙeer Deewj meceeefOe-mLeue hej Skeâcebefpeuee keâceje leLee Gmekesâ ÛeejeW Deesj efyevee Úle keâe yejeceoe lewÙeej ngDee~ OeveeYeeJe kesâ keâejCe keâece ÙeneR Deekeâj Deškeâ ieÙee~ peÙehegj kesâ Skeâ cete|lekeâej kesâ Éeje mebiecejcej keâer efMeuee hej KegoeF& keâjekeâj mJeeceerpeer keâer OÙeevecete|le keâe efvecee&Ce keâjeÙee ieÙee ~ Fmes 1916 F&. ceW mJeeceerpeer kesâ pevceeslmeJe kesâ hetJe& ceeqvoj keâer hetJeea oerJeej mes ueiee efoÙee ieÙee~ DeeefKejkeâej cetue Ùeespevee keâes ÚesÌ[keâj mJeeceer efJe%eeveevevo keâer osKejsKe ceW Jele&ceeve ogcebpeues ceeqvoj4 keâe efvecee&Ce ngDee~

1 ceF& 1897 keâes mebieef"le ‘jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve meefceefle’ kesâ meeceevÙe DeOÙe#e keâe heo mJeÙeb mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo ves ner Deuebke=âle efkeâÙee Lee~ Gmekesâ keâuekeâòes kesâvõ kesâ DeOÙe#e leLee meneOÙe#e ›eâceMe: mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo leLee mJeeceer Ùeesieevevo ngS Les~ meefÛeJe kesâ heo hej vejsvõveeLe efce$e ceveesveerle ngS Les~ efceMeve keâer mLeehevee kesâ yeeo pees keâesF& Yeer mesJee-keâeÙe&, JÙeeKÙeeve, keâ#eeSB Ùee ef›eâÙee-keâueehe ce" kesâ yeenj nesles Les, GvnW efceMeve kesâ veece hej ner ÛeueeÙee peelee Lee~ ÙeÅeefhe ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ DeeoMe& ceW efJeÕeemeer ie=nmLe leLee mebvÙeeefmeÙeeW keâes efceueekeâj efceMeve keâe mebie"ve ngDee Lee, leLeeefhe JÙeJenej ceW osKee ieÙee efkeâ efceMeve kesâ meejs keâece-keâepe mebvÙeemeerieCe ner Ûeuee jns nQ~ ‘efceMeve meefceefle’ keâer efveÙeefcele ieefleefJeefOe yeuejece-YeJeve ceW Devegeq‰le nesvesJeeueer meehleeefnkeâ meYee lekeâ ner meerefcele Leer~ Gmekeâer JÙeJemLee Deewj ÙeneB lekeâ efkeâ JÙeeKÙeeve osves keâe GòejoeefÙelJe lekeâ meeOeg-keâe|ceÙeeW hej ner Dee heÌ[e~ Fmeer yeerÛe ce" iebieeleš hej eqmLele yesuetÌ[ ceW mLeeveevleefjle nes Ûegkeâe Lee~ Fmekesâ HeâuemJe¤he efceMeve kesâ pevce kesâ leerve Je<eeX kesâ Yeerlej ner Fmekeâer meehleeefnkeâ meYee Yeer yevo nes ieÙeer~ hejvleg mJeeceerpeer

3. DeeueeeEmeiee hes®ceue Éeje 23/3/1904 keâes efueKes he$e keâe Skeâ DebMe : ‘‘After two years of good sleep I am awake again a little bit and am going about with dear Swami Ramakrishnananda for the last fortnight begging from house to house in Triplicane and thus have collected about Rs. 500. Some half a dozen of us have set apart our mornings for this purpose. How long this enthusiasm will last remains to be seen. About Rs.1000 was subscribed for more than a year ago. Thus we stand in the matter of theVivekananda Memorial.’’

4. otmejer cebefpeue hej peeves keâer meerÌ{er keâe efvecee&Ce keâeHeâer keâeue yeeo ngDee Lee~

Éeje ØeJee|lele YeeJeeoMe& keâer ØeeCeMeefòeâ leLee Gmekesâ Øeefle Deece pevelee keâer Øeyeue DeemLee kesâ keâejCe ‘efceMeve’ Meyo keâe GheÙeesie JÙeehekeâ nes G"e, Jewmes JewOeeefvekeâ Âef° mes Gme meceÙe ‘efceMeve’ keâer keâesF& Deueie meòee ve Leer~ 1901 F&. ceW ce" kesâ š^mšer-ceC[ue kesâ ie"ve kesâ hetJe& ner mJeeceerpeer ves efceMeve kesâ meeceevÙe DeOÙe#e keâe heo lÙeeie efoÙee Lee~ š^mšer-ceC[ue kesâ keâceea ner mecemle keâeÙeeX keâe mebÛeeueve keâjles jns~ kegâÚ Je<eeX kesâ DevegYeJe kesâ DeeOeej hej mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo, mJeeceer meejoevevo Deeefo vesleeDeeW ves keâevetve-efJeMes<e%e heušt keâj leLee ceesefnveer ceesnve Ûewšpeea Deeefo kesâ meeLe ÛeÛee& keâjves kesâ yeeo efceMeve keâes JewOeeefvekeâ ¤he osves keâe efveCe&Ùe efueÙee~5 mJeeceer meejoevevo ves 1907 F&. kesâ ceeÛe& ceW ceesefnveer ceesnve Ûewšpeea leLee mšeskeâes keâcheveer mes yeeleÛeerle keâjkesâ DeeJeMÙekeâ meueen ueer~ Devlele: 1860 F&. kesâ meesmeeFšer’pe Sskeäš kesâ Devegmeej 4 ceF& 1909 kesâ efove efceMeve keâes keâevetveer ¤he Øeoeve efkeâÙee ieÙee~ Skeâ ner JÙeefòeâ Éeje ce" leLee efceMeve – oesveeW keâe vesle=lJe meBYeeues peeves hej Yeer efceMeve keâer mecheefòe leLee Gmekeâe efnmeeye-efkeâleeye Deueie jKee peeves ueiee~ mJeeceerpeer keâer heefjkeâuhevee kesâ Devegmeej jeceke=â<Ce-DeeoMe& ceW efJeÕeemeer ie=ner-YeòeâeW leLee jeceke=â<Ce ce" kesâ mebvÙeeefmeÙeeW ceW mes efceMeve kesâ ØeejeqcYekeâ meomÙe yeveeÙes peeles jns~

mJeeceerpeer keâe efveoxMe Lee – ‘‘ØeÛeejkeâeÙe& kesâ Éeje ner mecØeoeÙe keâer peerJeveer-Meefòeâ yeueJeleer jnleer nw, DeleSJe ØeÛeejkeâeÙe& mes keâYeer efJejle ve nesvee~’’ he$e-heef$ekeâeSB leLee «evLe ner ØeÛeejkeâeÙe& kesâ yeefue‰ ceeOÙece nQ~ peveJejer, 1899 mes mebIe kesâ yeBieuee cegKehe$e ‘GodyeesOeve’6 keâe ØekeâeMeve DeejcYe ngDee~ Fmekesâ henues mecheeokeâ mJeeceer ef$eiegCeeleerleevevo ÛelegLe& Je<e& keâer keâee|lekeâ mebKÙee lekeâ Gmekeâe GòejoeefÙelJe meBYeeueves kesâ yeeo Decesefjkeâe Ûeues ieÙes~ Fmeer meceÙe mJeeceer meejoevevo ves efueKee Lee, ‘‘ns hee"keâ! GodyeesOeve heeBÛeJeW Je<e& ceW ØeefJe° ngDee~ ... Deehelele: efMeMeg nesves hej Yeer Ùen iecYeerj nw, DeuheJeÙemkeâ neskeâj Yeer Ùen yeueMeeueer nw Deewj Úesše neskeâj Yeer Ùen Yeejle kesâ Skeâ DebMe leLee YeefJe<Ùe ceW mece«e YeejleJe<e& kesâ keâuÙeeCe meeOeve keâes lelhej nw~’’ efiejerMeÛevõ yemeekeâ ves Skeâ Je<e& lekeâ leLee Gmekesâ yeeo efkeâMeesjer ceesnve jeÙe ves Fmekesâ ØekeâeMekeâ keâe GòejoeefÙelJe mJeerkeâej efkeâÙee~ kegâÚ Je<eeX lekeâ mecheeokeâ keâe keâeÙe& keâjles ngS mJeeceer Megæevevo kesâ yeerceej nes peeves hej mJeeceer meejoevevo ves mJeÙeb ner Fmekesâ mecheeove keâe GòejoeefÙelJe mJeerkeâej efkeâÙee Lee~7 [e@. MeefMe Yet<eCe Iees<e,

5. mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ 29/7/1909 keâes ßeerceleer yegue kesâ veece efueKes he$e keâe DebMe : ‘‘You will be glad to learn that R. K. Mission has been incorporated of late. Mrs. Mohini has helped us in doing the same.’’

  1. henues Ùen heeef#ekeâ Lee~ ome Je<e& yeeo Ùen ceeefmekeâ ceW heefjCele ngDee ~
  2. mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves 28/8/1908 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘GodyeesOeve keâe meeje keâeÙe& keâvOeeW hej uesvee heÌ[e nw~ megOeerj (Megæevevo) ves DemJemLe nes peeves kesâ keâejCe lÙeeiehe$e os efoÙee nw~ DeleSJe mecePe uees efkeâ meceÙe veneR nw~ Fmekesâ Thej (DeeBKeeW kesâ keâejCe) jele ceW efueKeves-heÌ{ves keâer keâesF& mecYeeJevee veneR nw~

168 mJeeceer meejoevevo

[e@. efyeefheve efyenejer Iees<e, hetCe&Ûevõ mes" Deeefo YeòeâeW keâer Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee mes meejoevevo peer ves heef$ekeâe keâe OeveeYeeJe otj efkeâÙee~ efiejervõ ueeue keâer ce=lÙeg kesâ yeeo ‘GodyeesOeve keâeÙee&ueÙe’ 30 veb. yeesmeheeje uesve kesâ efkeâjeÙes kesâ cekeâeve ceW mLeeveevleefjle efkeâÙee ieÙee~ Yeòeâ ‘KeesÌ[e kesâoej’ Éeje Øeoòe YetKeC[ hej Skeâ ogcebpeuee YeJeve yeveJeekeâj meejoevevo peer ves oes mecemÙeeDeeW keâe meceeOeeve efkeâÙee Lee~ 1908 F&. kesâ Deeqvlece Yeeie ceW Fme YeJeve keâer henueer cebefpeue ceW GodyeesOeve keâeÙee&ueÙe Deewj 1909 F&. keâer ceF& mes ogcebpeuee ßeerceeB kesâ efveJeeme kesâ ¤he ceW JÙeJeùle nesves ueiee~ ÙeneR mes yeBieuee ceW jeceke=â<Ce-efJeJeskeâevevo meeefnlÙe Yeer ØekeâeefMele neslee jne~

27 petve 1906 keâes ceeÙeeJeleer DeÉwleeßece kesâ ØeLece DeOÙe#e mJeeceer mJe¤heevevo keâer ce=lÙeg kesâ yeeo Gvekesâ mLeeve hej mJeeceer efJejpeevevo keâer efveÙegefòeâ ngF&~ kegâÚ ØeMeemeefvekeâ peefšueleeDeeW keâer ceerceebmee keâjves nsleg mJeeceer meejoevevo JeneB ieÙes Deewj Skeâ DemLeeÙeer meceeOeeve oskeâj ueewš DeeÙes~ mLeeÙeer meceeOeeve kesâ efueS ueewšles meceÙe Jes keâveKeue ieÙes, hejvleg JeneB mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo keâes ve heekeâj keâuekeâòes ueewš DeeÙes~ Deewj JeneR mes 23 veJecyej 1906 keâes GvneWves mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo kesâ veece Skeâ he$e ceW efueKee, ‘‘ßeerceleer mesefJeÙej keâer henues lees Deeßece keâes yevo keâjkesâ peceerve Deeefo keâes yesÛe osves keâer FÛÚe Leer~ ceQves peekeâj GvnW Fme yeele kesâ efueS jepeer efkeâÙee efkeâ keâce-mes-keâce Skeâ Je<e& lekeâ keâeÙe& Ûeueekeâj osKee peeÙe Deewj mJeeceerpeer kesâ «evLeeW kesâ ÙeneB mes cegõCe nes peeves kesâ yeeo ner kegâÚ keâjvee GefÛele nesiee – DevÙeLee keâeHeâer vegkeâmeeve nesiee~ Deewj efHeâj Ùeefo osKeves ceW DeeÙes efkeâ Deeßece keâe keâeÙe& "erkeâ "erkeâ Ûeue jne nw, lees efHeâj Gmes yevo keâjves keâer keäÙee DeeJeMÙekeâlee?

‘‘keâeueerke=â<Ce ves efHeâueneue ceeÛe& lekeâ kesâ efueS Deeßece keâe GòejoeefÙelJe mJeerkeâej keâj efueÙee nw Deewj Ùeefo leguemeer Ùee legce JeneB peekeâj Gmekeâer meueen Deeefo kesâ Éeje meneÙelee keâjes, lees Jen mLeeÙeer ¤he mes Yeer Ùen Yeej mJeerkeâej keâjves keâes lewÙeej nw~ leguemeer Ûecyee Ûeuee ieÙee nw Deewj Jen ceeÙeeJeleer peeves keâes jepeer veneR nw~ legcnejer Ùeefo FÛÚe nes, lees metefÛele keâjvee~ Jewmes legcnW hetjer mJeeOeervelee jnsieer~ ... legcnejs jepeer ve nesves keâer oMee ceW mecYeJele: Deeßece keâes yevo keâj osvee heÌ[siee~’’ mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo jepeer veneR ngS~ DevÙe keâesF& GheeÙe ve osKe, meejoevevo peer ves mJeeceer efJejpeevevo keâes Glmeen leLee ØesjCee osles ngS hegve: DevegjesOe efkeâÙee Deewj GvnW mLeeÙeer ¤he mes GòejoeefÙelJe mJeerkeâej keâjves keâes jepeer keâj efueÙee~ 1913 F&. lekeâ Gvekesâ vesle=lJe-keâeue kesâ oewjeve Jen Deeßece megÛee® ¤he mes Ûeuee~ efHeâj Gvekesâ mLeeve hej mJeeceer Øe%eevevo keâes efveÙegòeâ efkeâÙee ieÙee~ mJeeceer mJe¤heevevo Éeje ØeejcYe efkeâÙes ngS keâeÙe&

– Deb«espeer ceW mJeeceerpeer keâer jÛeveeJeueer kesâ ØeejeqcYekeâ heeBÛe KeC[eW keâe ØekeâeMeve, Deb«espeer ceW Ûeej KeC[eW ceW hetjer nesvesJeeueer mJeeceerpeer keâer peerJeveer keâe uesKeve Deeefo mJeeceer efJejpeevevo kesâ ØeMebmeveerÙe DeJeoeve nQ~ mJeeceerpeer keâer peerJeveer kesâ uesKeve ceW GvneWves mJeeceer meejoevevo mes meneÙelee kesâ efueS ØeeLe&vee keâer Leer~ meejoevevo peer ves 28 Deiemle 1908 keâes efueKee, ‘‘(mJeeceerpeer keâer) peerJeveer keâes mecheeefole keâjves keâe GòejoeefÙelJe ceQ mJeerkeâej keâjlee ntB, hejvleg keân veneR mekeâlee efkeâ GmeceW efJeMes<e kegâÚ Ùeesie Yeer keâj meketBâiee Ùee veneR~’’ mecYeJele: henues oes KeC[eW keâer heeC[gefueefhe meejoevevo peer osKe ieÙes Les~8

Fme Øemebie ceW ØeefleYeeMeeefueveer Yeefieveer efveJesefolee keâe Decej «evLe ‘The Master as I saw him’ (cesjs ieg®osJe : pewmee osKee) Yeer mcejCeerÙe nw~ Ùen «evLe efveJesefolee kesâ Ûeej Je<eeX kesâ keâ"esj heefjßece keâe Heâue Lee~ Fmekesâ ØekeâeMeve kesâ JÙeÙe meefnle meYeer Øekeâej kesâ GòejoeefÙelJe mJeeceer meejoevevo ves mJeerkeâej efkeâÙee Lee~9 efveJesefolee ves Deheves 23 efmelecyej 1909 kesâ he$e ceW efueKee nw, ‘‘The Master as I saw him hegmlekeâ kesâ ØekeâeMeve kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW cesjer meneÙelee keâjves kesâ efueS mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Gmes Deheves neLe ceW efueÙee nw~ ... mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Fmekesâ cegõCe-keâeÙe& leLee efJelejCe kesâ JÙeÙe kesâ efueS Deef«ece Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee keâer nw Deewj ØekeâeMeve kesâ efueS Yeer keâesF& Oeve veneR ues jns nQ~ Gvekeâe keânvee nw efkeâ Ùen Oeve yeeefuekeâe efJeÅeeueÙe kesâ efueS Gve ueesieeW keâer Deesj mes Ghenej-mJe¤he nesiee~’’10 1910 F&. kesâ 1 HeâjJejer keâes, mJeeceerpeer keâer pevceefleefLe kesâ efove Jen «evLe Fme osMe ceW ØekeâeefMele ngDee; Deewj Fmekesâ meeLe ner ueebiecewve «eerve kesâ Éeje FbiuewC[ ceW Yeer ØekeâeefMele ngDee~

mJeeceerpeer keâer ÙegJee Yeòeâ-ceC[ueer Éeje efvekeâeueer pee jner Deb«espeer ceeefmekeâ heef$ekeâe ‘yeÇÿeJeeefoved’ keâe ØekeâeMeve ceF&, 1913 mes yevo nes ieÙee Lee~ Deieueer ceF& mes ‘Jesoevlekesâmejer’ kesâ veece mes Fme Deb«espeer ceeefmekeâ keâes hegve: DeejcYe efkeâÙee ieÙee~ Fmeer yeerÛe ceõeme kesâ ce" mes Deb«espeer ceW kegâÚ hegmlekeWâ Yeer ØekeâeefMele ngF& LeeR, efpeveceW mes Skeâ mJeeceer meejoevevo Éeje efueKeer ngF& Leer~ 1915 F&. mes ceueÙeeuece Yee<ee ceW ‘Øeyegæ-kesâjueced’ ceeefmekeâ efvekeâueves ueiee~ ceeÙeeJeleer kesâ DeÉwleeßece mes ØekeâeefMele ‘mecevJeÙe’ veece keâe efnvoer ceeefmekeâ11 Yeer keâF& Je<eeX lekeâ Ûeuee~ kegâue efceueekeâj nce osKeles nQ efkeâ ßeerceeB keâer cenemeceeefOe kesâ hetJe& lekeâ efJeefYeVe Yee<eeDeeW ceW ce" leLee efceMeve kesâ ØekeâeMeveeW kesâ #es$e ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo ves pees vesle=lJe Øeoeve efkeâÙee Lee, Jen DelÙevle MueeIeveerÙe nw~

Fmeer keâeue ceW ce=lÙegosJelee ves jeceke=â<Ce-YeeJeevoesueve kesâ keâF& ØeOeeve veeÙekeâeW keâes Fme OejeOeece mes G"e efueÙee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ heeme meceeÛeej DeeÙee efkeâ kewâeqcyeÇpe (Decesefjkeâe) ceW ßeerceleer Deesueer yegue DelÙevle yeerceej nQ~ efveJesefolee Gme meceÙe oee|peeEueie ceW LeeR~ leej mes

  1. Fmekesâ ØeLece leLee efÉleerÙe KeC[ keâe ØekeâeMeve ›eâceMe: 1912 leLee 1913 F&. ceW ngDee Lee~
  2. Yeefieveer efveJesefolee, Øe›eeefpekeâe cegefòeâØeeCee, hebÛece meb., he==. 378-79
  3. efveJesefolee yeeefuekeâe efJeÅeeueÙe kesâ keâeÙe& ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo Yeefieveer efveJesefolee Deewj yeeo ceW Yeefieveer ef›eâeqmšve kesâ ØecegKe meueenkeâej leLee meneÙekeâ Les~ efJeÅeeueÙe kesâ efceMeve mes mebÙegòeâ nes peeves kesâ yeeo mes Deheves osnlÙeeie kesâ hetJe& lekeâ Jes ner Fmekesâ meefÛeJe jns~
  4. Ùen heef$ekeâe 1921 mes 1928 lekeâ, DeLee&le kegâue efceueekeâj 8 Je<e& lekeâ Ûeueer Leer~ (Deveg.)

170 mJeeceer meejoevevo

metÛevee heeves kesâ yeeo Jes JeneR mes jJeevee neskeâj 15 veJecyej (1910) keâes kewâeqcyeÇpe hengBÛeeR~ efveJesefolee keâes efvekeâš heekeâj ßeerceleer yegue keâer KegMeer keâe ef"keâevee ve jne~ efveJesefolee Gvekesâ heeme yew"keâj hegjeveer yeeleeW hej ÛeÛee& efkeâÙee keâjleer LeeR Deewj Fme Øekeâej Gvekesâ ceve ceW yesuetÌ[, DeuceesÌ[e leLee keâeMceerj keâer megKeo mce=efleÙeeB mepeerJe nes G"eR LeeR~ jesefieCeer mJeeceerpeer kesâ YeeJeeW mes heefjhetCe& nes G"eR~ hejvleg efÛeefkeâlmekeâeW kesâ mecemle ØeÙeeme efJeHeâue keâjles ngS 18 peveJejer (1911) keâes Gvekeâe peerJeveoerhe yegPe ieÙee~ Fve meùoÙe cenerÙemeer veejer kesâ hejueeskeâieceve hej mJeeceer meejoevevo leLee mecemle ce"Jeemeer yeÌ[s JÙeefLele ngS~ Gvekeâer Oeerj-eqmLej yegefæ leLee ceele=Jeled mvesn kesâ keâejCe ner mJeeceerpeer GvnW ‘Oeerje-ceelee’ kesâ ¤he ceW mecyeesefOele efkeâÙee keâjles Les~ mJeeceer meejoevevo Yeer Gvekesâ Øeefle ßeæe leLee Øeerefle keâe YeeJe jKeles Les~ GvnW Jes ‘oeoerceeB’ kesâ ¤he ceW mecyeesefOele keâjles Les~ jeceke=â<Ce mebIe kesâ efueS Gvekeâer Goej Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee leLee efJeefYeVe efJe<eÙeeW ceW Gvekeâer JÙeeJeneefjkeâ-yegefæÙegòeâ meueen kesâ efueS meYeer ke=âle%eleehetJe&keâ Gvekeâe mcejCe keâjWies~ ‘ueerueeØemebie’ «evLe ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Fbefiele efkeâÙee nw efkeâ ßeerceleer yegue peieocyee Éeje efveOee&efjle ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ jmeooejeW ceW Skeâ LeeR~

mJeeceerpeer kesâ efØeÙe efMe<Ùe leLee ogŠmeenmeer Øesceer mebvÙeemeer mJeeceer meoevevo JeMeerÕej mesve kesâ (8 yeesmeheeÌ[e uesve ceW eqmLele) efkeâjeÙes kesâ cekeâeve ceW oes Je<eeX mes DelÙevle yeerceej DeJemLee ceW efyemlej hej heÌ[s Les~ 8 HeâjJejer (1911) keâes GvneWves Deeqvlece meeBme ueer~ oes efoveeW hetJe& mJeeceer meejoevevo GvnW osKe DeeÙes Les~ mJeeceerpeer kesâ efMe<Ùe ‘ieghle’12 keâes Deheves DeeBKeeW kesâ meeceves mes ner Ûeues peeles osKekeâj Jes DelÙevle cecee&nle ngS Les~

ce=lÙegosJelee ves Deye jeceke=â<Ce-YeeJeevoesueve kesâ Skeâ cenejLeer keâer Deesj neLe HewâueeÙee~ mJeeceer jeceke=â<Ceevevo megoerIe& Ûeewon Je<eeX mes oef#eCeer Yeejle ceW jeceke=â<Ce-YeeJeevoesueve keâe mebie"ve keâj jns Les~ keâ"esj heefjßece kesâ HeâuemJe¤he Jes jepeÙe#cee mes jesiee›eâevle nes ieÙes Les~ 9 petve (1911) keâes GvnW GodyeesOeve kesâ YeJeve ceW ueekeâj Gvekeâer efÛeefkeâlmee leLee mesJeeMegßet<ee keâer JÙeJemLee keâer ieÙeer~ hejvleg mecemle ØeÙeemeeW keâes efJeHeâue keâjles ngS 21 Deiemle (1911) keâes mJeeceer jeceke=â<Ceevevo ves meceeefOeÙeesie mes Dehevee GvÛeeme Je<e& keâe Mejerj lÙeeie efoÙee~ Gvekesâ ‘meejs DebieeW ceW keâeHeâer keâeue lekeâ DemeeOeejCe heguekeâ’ osKekeâj ieg®YeüeleeieCe ßeerieg®osJe keâer peÙe-peÙekeâej keâjves ueies~ ‘GodyeesOeve’ heef$ekeâe ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo ves efueKee, ‘‘ns yegefæceeved, Ùeefo legce kesâJeue efveŠmJeeLe&lee, DeOÙeJemeeÙe leLee GösMÙe kesâ Øeefle Skeâefve‰e keâes osKekeâj ner ceveg<Ùe-peerJeve leLee Gmekesâ ef›eâÙee-keâueeheeW keâe cetuÙeebkeâve keâjves kesâ DeYÙemle nes, lees DeeDees, nceejs meeLe meeqcceefuele neskeâj Deheves DeeBmet heeWÚles ngS keânes – Ssmee peerJeve mebmeej ceW ogue&Ye nw~ mJeeLe&-keâueg<eleehetCe& he=LJeer hej Gvekeâe Deeoj veneR nesles osKekeâj ner peieled kesâ DeejeOÙeosJe ves Deuhe keâeue ceW GvnW Deheves heeme yeguee efueÙee~’’

12. mJeeceer meoevevo keâe hetJe&veece MejÛÛevõ ieghle Lee~

Fmekesâ henues ner, 28 efomecyej 1909 keâes Je=æ mJeeceer DeÉwleevevo hejceOeece keâes Ûeues ieÙes Les~ "ekegâj kesâ mebvÙeemeer efMe<ÙeeW ceW Jes ner ce=lÙegosJelee kesâ ÛeewLes efMekeâej Les~

Deewj Yeer henues 9 ceF& 1904 keâes mejuelee, efvee|uehlelee Deeefo iegCeeW mes Yetef<ele "ekegâj kesâ F&Õejkeâesefš hee<e&o mJeeceer efvejbpeveevevo ves nefjÉej ceW ØeeCeIeeleer efJemetefÛekeâe jesie mes Dee›eâevle neskeâj Mejerj lÙeeie keâj efoÙee Lee~

menmee Skeâ Deewj ogŠmebJeeo Dee hengBÛee efkeâ mJeeceerpeer keâer ceevemekeâvÙee Yeefieveer efveJesefolee ves 13 Deòetâyej (1911) keâes oee|peeEueie ceW osnlÙeeie keâj efoÙee nw~13 jeceke=â<Ce-YeeJeOeeje mes pegÌ[s meYeer ueesie ogKe mes cecee&nle nes ieÙes~ efJeefYeVe he$e-heef$ekeâeDeeW ceW Gvekesâ Øeefle Deveskeâ ßeæebpeefueÙeeB ØekeâeefMele ngFË~ efveJesefolee keâer Úe$eeleguÙe ßeerceleer mejueeyeeuee mejkeâej ves Deheves ßeæeIÙe& kesâ ¤he ceW ‘efveJesefolee’ veecekeâ hegmlekeâ keâer jÛevee keâer~ Fmekeâer Yetefcekeâe ceW mJeeceer meejoevevo ves efueKee, ‘‘lesjn Je<e& GvneWves efpeme Øekeâej efyeleeS Les – efpeme DehetJe& efve‰e, Devevle DeOÙeJemeeÙe leLee levceÙe-OÙeeve ceW [tyeer jnkeâj Jes ue#Ùe keâer Deesj De«emej ngF& LeeR, Gve yeeleeW mes Deece ueesie DeJeiele veneR nQ~ efveJesefolee keâes Kees yew"ves kesâ yeeo Deye Gve yeeleeW keâes peeveves kesâ efueS meyekesâ ØeeCeeW ceW Skeâ Øeyeue Deekeâeb#ee keâe GoÙe ngDee nw~ ... Deewj Gve ueesieeW keâes Gvekesâ Éeje efvelÙe Devegef‰le nesvesJeeues mewkeâÌ[eW keâceeX kesâ heerÚs efJejeefpele Gvekesâ ùoÙe kesâ Gme Øesce keâes osKeves leLee cetuÙeebkeâve keâjves keâe ØeÙeeme keâjvee nesiee – Gme melele JeOe&ceeve Øesce keâes – efpemekesâ Ûeueles Jes ve kesâJeue Yeejle kesâ ØelÙeskeâ vej-veejer keâes, yeequkeâ nj efMeueeKeC[ lekeâ keâes heefJe$e leLee efveleevle Dehevee ceevekeâj efÛejkeâeue kesâ efueS ùoÙe ceW yemee uesleer LeeR~’’

Fmekesâ yeeo "ekegâj kesâ YewjJeYeòeâ leLee jeceke=â<Ce-mebIe kesâ efÛejmegùo efiejerMeÛevõ Iees<e hej ce=lÙegosJelee keâer Âef° heÌ[er~ 9 HeâjJejer 1912 F&. keâes jele ceW oes yepes efiejerMeÛevõ kesâ yengcegKeer peerJeve keâe heše#eshe ngDee~ Deieues efove ØeeleŠkeâeue peekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo ves GvnW ßeæebpeefue oer~ meejoevevo peer ØeeÙe: ner jesie mes efyemlej hekeâÌ[s efiejerMeÛevõ keâes osKeves peeÙee keâjles Les~ Jes veš-keâefJe efiejerMeÛevõ kesâ efJeMes<e Devegjeieer Les~

jeceke=â<Ce-mebIe kesâ Thej ce=lÙegosJelee kesâ Fme Göece ve=lÙe keâes mJeeceer meejoevevo ves mee#eer kesâ meceeve osKee Deewj peneB Yeer mecYeJe ngDee Jes ce=lÙeg-heefLekeâ kesâ efvekeâš pee KeÌ[s ngS~ Deheves ùoÙe kesâ DeeJesieeW keâes mebÙeefcele jKekeâj Jes mebIe keâer DehetjCeerÙe #eefle keâes meBYeeueves ceW ueies jns~

μμμ

efJeJeskeâevevo veecekeâ mJeCe&oC[ kesâ mheMe& mes levõeceie> je°^ kesâ Mejerj ceW peeiejCe kesâ ue#eCe Øekeâš ngS Les~ efJeJeskeâevevo kesâ Dee£eve hej ÙegJee-meceepe kesâ ùoÙe ceW Øeyeue lejbie
