13. efnceeueÙe keâer ieeso ceW efveJesefolee keâer efÛeleeYetefce hej Skeâ mce=efle-mlecYe keâe efvecee&Ce ngDee Lee~ Gme hej efueKee Lee – ÙeneB Yeefieveer efveJesefolee efÛejMeeeqvle ceW efJeßeece keâj jner nQ, efpevneWves YeejleJe<e& kesâ efueS Dehevee meJe&mJe mecehe&Ce keâj efoÙee Lee~

172 mJeeceer meejoevevo

G"er LeeR~ mJeeceerpeer kesâ mevosMe keâe ue#Ùe Lee – DeelceefJeÕeeme leLee DeelceefJekeâeme kesâ DeeOeej hej JÙeefòeâ keâe Ûeefj$e-ie"ve leLee ÙegJeeJeie& keâer Ûeslevee keâes ØeyeesefOele keâjvee~ Deb«espe MeemekeâeW kesâ mece#e DeeJesove-efveJesove kesâ mLeeve hej, Deheveer Devlee|veefnle Meefòeâ mes DeYÙegoÙe ner efJeJeskeâevevo kesâ heLe hej ÛeuevesJeeueeW keâe ue#Ùe Lee~ yeejermeeue-<e[Ùeb$e kesâ ceeceues mes mecyeeqvOele leLÙeeW kesâ ØekeâeMe ceW Dee peeves kesâ yeeo mes ner efJeJeskeâevevo-efJejesOeer MeefòeâÙeeB Gvekesâ efJeÛeejeW leLee keâceeX kesâ Yeerlej efkeâmeer jepeveereflekeâ leelheÙe& keâer Keespe keâjleer jneR~ ‘FbeqiueMecewve’ he$e keâe Dee›eâceCe ›eâceMe: Øeyeue nes G"e; ceeefmekeâ ‘Øeyegæ Yeejle’ ves yeerÛe yeerÛe ceW Gmekeâe mecegefÛele Gòej efoÙee Lee~ šsieeš& meenye (Mr. C. A. Tegart) keâer meueen hej efceMeve kesâ mebÛeeuekeâeW ves 1914 kesâ DeØewue ceW ‘A Warning to the public’ Meer<e&keâ Skeâ efJe%eeqhle keâe he$e-heef$ekeâeDeeW ceW ØekeâeMeve keâjeÙee~14 Fmekesâ Éeje Deece pevelee keâes metefÛele efkeâÙee ieÙee Lee efkeâ jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve Skeâ Oeee|cekeâ mebmLee nw Deewj efkeâmeer Yeer Øekeâej kesâ jepeveweflekeâ Deevoesueve kesâ meeLe Fmekeâe keâesF& Yeer mecheke&â veneR nw~15 Fmekeâer Øeefleef›eâÙee efceefßele ngF&~

Fmeer yeerÛe hegefueme kesâ ieghleÛej efJeYeeie Éeje jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve kesâ efJe®æ Deveskeâ DeefYeÙeesie Skeâ$e keâjves kesâ yeeo mejkeâejer oHeälej ceW pecee keâj efoÙes ieÙes Les~ 1915 F&. ceW ØekeâeefMele yebieeue ØeMeemeve keâcesšer keâer efjheesš& ceW keâne ieÙee Lee efkeâ mJeeOeervelee kesâ efueS Deevoesueve-keâlee&DeeW hej mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo leLee Gvekesâ meeefnlÙe keâe Øeyeue ØeYeeJe nw~ efJeefYeVe he$e-heef$ekeâeSB Fmekesâ ØeefleJeeo mes Pebke=âle nes G"eR~ Fve meye keâer hejJeen ve keâjles ngS yebieeue ØeosMe kesâ ieJeve&j uee[& keâejceeFkesâue ves 1916 F&. kesâ 16 efomecyej keâes Deheves ojyeej-Yee<eCe ceW efceMeve hej oes<eejesheCe efkeâÙee~ GvneWves keâne efkeâ jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve mesJeeOece& keâer DeeÌ[ ceW jepeveereflekeâ efJehueefJeÙeeW keâes DeeßeÙe leLee ØeßeÙe os jne nw~ Gvekeâe DeefYeÙeesie Lee efkeâ DeelebkeâJeeoer šesefueÙeeB ‘‘Often seize the opportunity,

which membership in a charitable society like Ramakrishna Mission or participation in the relief of the distressed, gives them to meet and influence the boys who have noble ideas, but who have not

enough experience to judge where a parti-cular course must lead.’’

hejJeleea keâeue ceW efueKes ieÙes Fefleneme kesâ heVeeW ceW nce osKeles nQ efkeâ Gve efoveeW Yeefieveer

  1. yebieeue kesâ ieJeve&j uee[& keâejceeFkesâue kesâ veece 23 peveJejer, 1917 keâes Øeoòe DeeJesove keâer 9JeeR hebefòeâ õ°JÙe nw~
  2. Oece& leLee jepeveerefle kesâ Ieeuecesue keâe pewmes efJe<eceÙe heefjCeece osKeves keâes efceuelee nw, Fme efJe<eÙe ceW Fefleneme%e mJeeceerpeer meoe meÛesleve Les~ Ghejesòeâ efJe%eeqhle kesâ ØekeâeMeve kesâ hetJe& ner mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheveer ‘Yeejle ceW Meefòeâhetpee’ hegmlekeâ keâer Yetefcekeâe ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘Jele&ceeve keâeue ceW efJehueJeJeeoer ueesie keâYeer keâYeer Fme Øekeâej kesâ Fefleneme leLee DeeOÙeeeqlcekeâ MeeŒeeW kesâ Yee<eeJejCe ceW Dehevee ieghle DeefYeØeeÙe JÙeòeâ efkeâÙee keâjles nQ; Fmemes keâesF& Ùen ve mecePe ues efkeâ nceves Yeer Jewmee ner efkeâÙee nw Ùee efHeâj nceejer Gvekesâ meeLe keâesF& menevegYetefle nw~’’

efveJesefolee mes pegÌ[s ngS efJehueefJeÙeeW ceW mes DeefOekeâebMe ner efJeJeskeâevevo-YeeJeOeeje mes DevegØeeefCele Les~ efceMeve Éeje heefjÛeeefuele efJeefYeVe jenle-keâeÙeeX leLee yesuetÌ[ ce" ceW DeeÙeesefpele nesvesJeeues GlmeJeeW ceW pees ÙegJekeâieCe Yeeie uesles Les, Gvekesâ meeLe ner efJehueJeer oue kesâ kegâÚ ueesieeW kesâ meeceefÙekeâ ¤he mes ØeJesMe ceW Dee§eÙe&pevekeâ kegâÚ Yeer veneR nw~ Ùen yeele Deewj nw efkeâ osJe›ele, MeÛeerve, efØeÙeveeLe, meleerMe, melÙesve Deeefo kegâÚ ÙegJekeâeW ves jepeveerefle Ùee ieghle meefceefleÙeeW mes Dehevee mecheke&â hetjer leewj mes efJeeqÛÚVe keâjkesâ mebIe ceW Ùeesieoeve efkeâÙee Lee Deewj Gve ueesieeW hej efvejvlej ieghleÛej hegefueme keâer Âef° ueieer jnleer Leer~ Demleg, ieJeve&j cenesoÙe kesâ Fme Øekeâej keâer Je›eâesefòeâ keâer JÙeeKÙee keâjkesâ Deveskeâ ueesie efceMeve kesâ YeefJe<Ùe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW lejn lejn keâer DeškeâueW ueieeves ueies Les~ mejkeâej mes efvekeâš mecyevOe jKevesJeeues Deheves efnlewef<eÙeeW keâer Âef° ceW efceMeve leLee ce" kesâ mebvÙeemeerieCe huesie kesâ peerJeeCegDeeW kesâ meceeve YeÙebkeâj Øeleerle nesves ueies~ Jewmes efkeâmeer efkeâmeer ves ieJeve&j kesâ JeòeâJÙe keâe ØeefleJeeo Yeer efkeâÙee, efpeveceW jeceevevo ÛeóesheeOÙeeÙe keâe ØeefleJeeo efJeMes<e GuuesKeveerÙe nw~

pewmee efkeâ mJeeYeeefJekeâ Lee, efceMeve kesâ mebÛeeuekeâeW ves Fme hej hejsMeeveer keâe DevegYeJe efkeâÙee~ Gme meceÙe mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo oef#eCeer Yeejle ceW Les~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves ieJeve&j-neGme ceW peekeâj efce. ieguex kesâ meeLe ØeejeqcYekeâ ÛeÛee& keâer Deewj ieJeve&j kesâ meeLe efceueves keâe ØeyevOe efkeâÙee~ Fmekesâ hetJe& ner DeefOeJeòeâe oeMejLeer meevÙeeue keâer meueen ueskeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo ves jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve kesâ mebÛeeuekeâ-ceC[ue keâer Deesj mes 23 peveJejer 1917 keâes mejkeâej kesâ veece Skeâ mcejCe-he$e Yespe efoÙee Lee~ MeefveJeej, 10 ceeÛe& 1917 keâes ieJeve&j kesâ meeLe mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer cegueekeâele leLee ÛeÛee&16 mes mejkeâejer he#e keâe meeje mevosn otj nes ieÙee Lee~ Fmekesâ HeâuemJe¤he ieJeve&j uee[& keâejceeFkesâue ves 26 ceeÛe& keâes mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ veece efueefKele Skeâ he$e kesâ Éeje Deheves meejs DeefYeÙeesie Skeâ lejn mes Jeeheme ues efueS~17 heef$ekeâe ceW Fme he$e kesâ ØekeâeefMele nes peeves kesâ yeeo Ssmee ueiee efkeâ DeeÙeer ngF& efJeheefòe keâš ieÙeer~

16. mJeeceer Øesceevevo ves 13/3/1917 keâes mJeeceer censÕejevevo kesâ veece Deheves he$e ceW efueKee, ‘‘ueeš meenye ves Mejled YeeF& keâes Deheves Deemeve hej yew"ekeâj mJeeiele efkeâÙee Lee~ ueielee nw efkeâ Jes efceMeve kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW yeÌ[e DeÛÚe cele JÙeòeâ keâjWies~ meye "ekegâj kesâ peeot keâe Kesue nw~ ØeYeg efkeâleveer ner ueerueeSB keâjles nQ~’’

17. ieJeve&j kesâ he$e keâe Skeâ DebMe Fme Øekeâej nw – ‘‘I regret very much to hear that words used by me at the Durbar in December last, regarding the Mission should have led in any way to the curtailment of the good religious, social and educational work the Mission has done and is doing. As you, I know, realise my object was not to condemn the Mission and its members. I know the character of the Mission's work is entirely non-political, and I have nothing but good of its work of social service to the people.’’

174 mJeeceer meejoevevo

ieJeve&j kesâ meeLe cegueekeâele kesâ yeeo mJeeceer meejoevevo ves ieJeve&j keâer keâeQefmeue kesâ meomÙe ketâšveerefle%e heer. meer. ueeÙeve kesâ meeLe ÛeÛee& keâer~ Gvekesâ DeeosMe hej MeÛeerve (mJeeceer efÛevceÙeevevo) leLee meleerMe (mJeeceer melÙeevevo) hej mes ieghleÛej hegefueme keâer efveiejeveer yevo nes ieÙeer~ Fve mecemle IešveeDeeW kesâ HeâuemJe¤he peveceeveme ceW jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve keâe Dejepeveweflekeâ Ûeefj$e mhe°lej nes G"e~ Ssmes efÉOee«emle meceepemesJeer ueesie, pees oeJee keâjles nw efkeâ jepeveerefle mes efJecegKe neskeâj meceepe-mesJee DemecYeJe nw, Jes Yeer jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve kesâ mesJeekeâce& keâer Oeeje leLee GösMÙe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW efpe%eemeg nes G"s~

efpeme meceÙe mJeeceer meejoevevo Ghejesòeâ mecemÙee keâes ueskeâj DelÙevle JÙemle Les, Gme meceÙe Gvekeâe mJeemLÙe "erkeâ veneR Ûeue jne Lee~ keâeÙe& meceehle nesles ner GvnW Jeele leLee ceg$eeMeÙe keâer heerÌ[e mes efyemlej hekeâÌ[vee heÌ[e~ Gvekeâer heerÌ[e keâes otj keâjves ceW DemeceLe& neskeâj [e@. efJeefheve efJenejer Iees<e, [e@. ogiee&heo Iees<e leLee [e@. %eevesvõveeLe keâebpeerueeue ves cespej Jee[& keâes ueeves keâer JÙeJemLee keâer~ Gvekeâer efÛeefkeâlmee mes cenejepe ves oes mehleen lekeâ jesie mes Yegieleves kesâ yeeo DeVe-heLÙe uesvee DeejcYe efkeâÙee~

nce peeve-yetPekeâj henues ner yelee DeeÙes nQ efkeâ uee[& keâejceeFkesâue keâe he$e ØekeâeefMele nesves kesâ yeeo Ssmee ueie jne Lee efkeâ efceMeve jepejes<e mes cegòeâ nes Ûegkeâe nw, hejvleg Jemlegle: Ssmee ngDee veneR Lee~ [e@. jcesMeÛevõ cepetceoej, [e@. uee[ueerceesnve jeÙeÛeewOejer Deeefo MeesOekeâlee&DeeW ves eEš[sue, eqmšHeWâmeve leLee ueeÙeve Deeefo keâer efšhheefCeÙeeW keâes heÌ{keâj osKee nw efkeâ uee[& keâejceeFkesâue kesâ Ghejesòeâ Yeüce-efveJeejCe efJe<eÙekeâ he$e kesâ yeeo Yeer jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve kesâ efJe®æ Deb«espe mejkeâej keâe Dee›eâceCe peejer jne~ 1917 F&. kesâ Devle ceW ØekeâeefMele pescme kewâcheyesue keâj keâe ‘Political Trouble in India’ (1907-17), 15 DeØewue 1918 keâes Yeejle mejkeâej kesâ meeceves Øemlegle jewueš keâcesšer keâer efjheesš& Deeefo ceW mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo leLee jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve kesâ efJe®æ keâšg GefòeâÙeeB meener kesâ keâeBšeW kesâ meceeve mhe° efoKeeF& os jner LeeR~ Fmekesâ meeLe ner mejkeâejer efveoxMe hej ieghleÛej hegefueme leLee hegefueme kesâ yeÌ[s yeÌ[s DeefOekeâejer efceMeve kesâ Thej Deheveer leer#Ce efveieen ieÌ[eS ngS Les~ mecYeJele: mejkeâej keâer jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve keâes iewjkeâevetveer Ieesef<ele keâjves keâer Ùeespevee Yeer Leer~

[e@. jcesMeÛevõ cepetceoej Éeje efueefKele ‘mJeeOeervelee meb«eece kesâ Fefleneme ceW jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve’ Meer<e&keâ ØeyevOe mes ØeeOÙeehekeâ Mebkeâjer Øemeeo yemeg ves kegâÚ cenòJehetCe& leLÙe GodOe=le efkeâÙes nQ~ jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve mes mecyeeqvOele Skeâ ieesheveerÙe HeâeFue keâes heÌ{keâj [e@. cepetceoej ves osKee Lee efkeâ efJeefYeVe leLÙeeW leLee ØeceeCeeW kesâ meeLe mes›esâšjer ves yeÌ[s ueeš (ieJeve&j-pevejue) kesâ heeme ØeefleJesove Yespekeâj Gvemes efmeHeâeefjMe keâer Leer efkeâ jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve keâes iewjkeâevetveer Ieesef<ele keâjkesâ Gmes yevo keâj efoÙee peeÙe~ Fmes heÌ{ves kesâ yeeo yeÌ[s ueeš ves HeâeFue hej efueKee, ‘‘hegefueme keâer efjheesš& leLee mes›esâšjer keâer efmeHeâeefjMe keâer yeele mecYeJele: yesuetÌ[ ce" kesâ mebÛeeuekeâieCe peeve ieÙes nQ~ keäÙeeWefkeâ kesâJeue kegâÚ ner efoveeW hetJe& Skeâ Decesefjkeâer ceefnuee ves cesjs meeLe cegueekeâele keâjkesâ keâne efkeâ Ùeefo yesuetÌ[ ce" keâes yevo efkeâÙee peeÙeiee, lees Decesefjkeâe ceW Fmekesâ efJe®æ ØeÛeC[ Deevoesueve nesiee~ Fme meceÙe efkeâmeer Yeer Øekeâej mes Decesefjkeâe keâe efJejesOe-Yeepeve yevevee GefÛele veneR nesiee~ Dele: yesuetÌ[ ce" keâes yevo ve keâjkesâ, ncesMee kesâ efueS JeneB meeoer heesMeekeâ ceW kegâÚ hegefueme keâce&ÛeeefjÙeeW keâes efveÙegòeâ keâj efoÙee peeÙe~ efpeve efJehueefJeÙeeW kesâ veece hetJeexòeâ hegefueme keâer leeefuekeâe ceW nQ, GveceW mes pees Yeer ce" ceW neW, Gvekeâer ieefleefJeefOeÙeeW hej keâÌ[er vepej jKeer peeÙe~’’18

FmeceW mevosn veneR efkeâ kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ ner Ghejesòeâ ‘Decesefjkeâer ceefnuee’ LeeR~ Gvekeâer Yeebpeer Deueyeše& efJeJeen kesâ Ghejevle ues[er mewC[efJeÛe nes ieÙeer LeeR~ Fmeer met$e mes kegâ. cewkeäueeG[ keâe FbiuewC[ leLee YeejleJe<e& ceW mejkeâej kesâ GÛÛe DeefOekeâeefjÙeeW kesâ yeerÛe DeyeeOe ¤he mes Deevee-peevee Ûeuelee Lee~ mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo leLee Gvekesâ Éeje mLeeefhele jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve Deewj Yeejle kesâ keâuÙeeCe nsleg mJeeceerpeer keâer Fve efMe<Ùee keâer ceewve leLee cetuÙeJeeve mesJee efÛejmcejCeerÙe jnsieer~ kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ Ghejesòeâ jepejes<e kesâ ØelÙe#e Dee›eâceCe mes efceMeve keâer j#ee keâjves keâes cewoeve ketâo heÌ[er LeeR~ efHeâj jepejes<e kesâ hejes#e Dee›eâceCe kesâ meceÙe Yeer GvneWves ner ceesÛee& meBYeeuee Lee~ F&mš FeqC[Ùee jsue keâcheveer ves ce" kesâ oef#eCeer Yeeie mes pegÌ[s Skeâ efJeMeeue YetKeC[ keâes DeefOe«enCe keâj uesves keâe efveCe&Ùe keâj efueÙee Lee~ Fme meJe&veeMeer kegâÛe›eâ hej ce" kesâ mebÛeeuekeâeW leLee efnleefÛevlekeâeW ves Deheves yeÌ[e ner DemeneÙe cenmetme efkeâÙee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves lelkeâeue ner yebieeue kesâ ieJeve&j keâes Skeâ efJejesOe-he$e Yespe efoÙee~19 hejvleg Fleves mes efveef§evle ve neskeâj GvneWves meejer yeele kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ keâes yeleeÙeer~ Jes Fme ceeceues mes pegÌ[s GÛÛe heomLe Deb«espe DeefOekeâeefjÙeeW mes efceueeR Deewj GvnW mecePee-yegPeekeâj ce" kesâ Devegketâue mecemÙee keâe meceeOeeve keâjeves kesâ yeeo mšercej ceW meJeej neskeâj ce" ceW ueewšeR~ Jen 2 HeâjJejer 1924 keâe efove Lee~ yeeieyeepeej pee jns mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ meeLe Gvekeâer yesuetÌ[ kesâ mšercej-pesšer hej cegueekeâele ngF&~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves nBmekeâj GvnW meeOegJeeo osles ngS keâne, ‘‘Victory to you, Tantine!’ (šwvšeFve, legcnejer peÙe nes!) kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ ves neue ner ceW efvee|cele mJeeceerpeer kesâ Õesle-MegYeü ogcebpeues ceeqvoj keâer Deesj Fbefiele keâjles ngS keâne, ‘‘Victory to me, Swami! Victory to that piece of solid rock which is seated over there.’’ kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ keâer efJeÕeeme-oerhle JeeCeer mes le=hle neskeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo yeeieyeepeej Ûeues

  1. efJeJeskeâevevo Dees mecekeâeueerve YeejleJe<e& (yeBieuee «ebLe), Mebkeâjer Øemeeo yemeg, KeC[ 6, he==. 330-31
  2. mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Deheves 8 peveJejer 1924 kesâ he$e ceW Skeâ yeÇÿeÛeejer keâes efueKee Lee, ‘‘yesuetÌ[ keâer peceerve kesâ DeefOe«enCe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW Deveskeâ mLeeveeW mes Fmekeâe efJejesOe nes jne nw~ mejkeâej keäÙee keâjsieer, Fmekeâe DeYeer lekeâ efveCe&Ùe veneR ngDee nw~’’

176 mJeeceer meejoevevo

ieÙes Deewj kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ yesuetÌ[ ce" ceW Deekeâj DeefleefLe-YeJeve ceW ØeefJe° nes ieÙeeR~20

Fme Øekeâej jepejes<e leLee pevecele keâe meecevee keâjves kesâ Deefleefjòeâ Yeer ce" kesâ vesle=Je=vo Deewj efJeMes<ekeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo keâes DemebKÙe PebPešeW keâe meecevee keâjvee heÌ[e nw~ nce henues ner yelee DeeÙes nQ efkeâ mJeeceerpeer kesâ DeeoMeeX mes Göerefhele yengle-mes ÙegJekeâ DeelebkeâJeeoer efJehueJe keâe ceeie& ÚesÌ[keâj mebvÙeemeer-mebIe ceW meeqcceefuele nes ieÙes Les~ Gvekesâ heerÚs ‘efÚhekeâueer’ DeLee&le ieghleÛej hegefueme ueieer ner jnleer Leer~ Fmekesâ HeâuemJe¤he ce" leLee efceMeve kesâ cegKÙeeueÙe leLee efkeâmeer efkeâmeer MeeKee keâes keâeHeâer keâef"veeFÙeeB Pesueveer heÌ[eR~ hegefueme kesâ efJeMes<e mevosnYeepeve oes-Skeâ ueesieeW kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW lees mebIeeOÙe#e mJeeceer yeÇÿeevevo lekeâ DeeMebefkeâle nes G"s Les~ Ssmeer peefšue heefjeqmLeefle kesâ yeerÛe eqmLejyegefæ mJeeceer meejoevevo mJeÙeb ner Fve ÙegJekeâeW kesâ he#e ceW peceeveleoej kesâ ¤he ceW KeÌ[s ngS Les~ keâYeer keâYeer lees meejoevevo peer keâes hegefueme keâe ogJÙe&Jenej lekeâ menvee heÌ[e Lee~ Ssmes ner Skeâ ÙegJekeâ ves MejCeeiele-Jelmeue mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ Øeefle Deheveer ke=âle%elee JÙeòeâ keâjles ngS efueKee Lee, ‘‘Gvekeâer ke=âhee ve nesves hej Gve efoveeW nce ueesieeW kesâ meceeve efJehueJeer oue kesâ meeLe pegÌ[s ÙegJekeâeW keâe ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ DeeßeÙe ceW Dee heevee DemecYeJe neslee~’’21 Deevevo keâer yeele Ùen nw efkeâ FveceW mes ØelÙeskeâ ves mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ efJeÕeeme keâes GefÛele ceÙee&oe Øeoeve keâer Leer Deewj FveceW mes DeefOekeâebMe ves ce" leLee efceMeve kesâ cenòJehetCe& GòejoeefÙelJeeW keâe efveJee&n efkeâÙee Lee~ Fme Øekeâej kesâ ÙegJekeâeW keâes ueskeâj efpeme Øekeâej keâer heefjeqmLeefle GlheVe nesleer Leer, Gmeer kesâ oes GoenjCe Øemlegle nQ~

mebIe ceW ØeefJe° ngS Skeâ veJeerve mebvÙeemeer keâer megj#ee kesâ efueS mJeeceer meejoevevo GvnW meeLe ueskeâj hegefueme kesâ Skeâ DeefOekeâejer mes efceueves ieÙes Les~ Gme keâce&Ûeejer ves cenejepe keâes yew"ves lekeâ kesâ efueS veneR keâne, efkeâmeer lejn keâe meewpevÙe Yeer veneR efoKeeÙee~ cenejepe KeÌ[s KeÌ[s yeeleÛeerle meceehle keâjkesâ Gme keâce&Ûeejer mes efJeoe ueskeâj Ûeues DeeÙes~ ueewšles meceÙe meeLe kesâ mebvÙeemeer ves og:Ke Øekeâš keâjles ngS cenejepe mes keâne, ‘‘cenejepe, cegPes yeÌ[e keâ° nes jne nw~ cesjs efueS ner Deehekeâes – Deehekesâ meceeve Skeâ meeOeg keâes Ùen Deheceeve leLee Demecceeve menvee heÌ[e~’’ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves GvnW efoueemee osles ngS keâne, ‘‘cesje Deheceeve Yeuee keâewve keâj mekeâlee nw? Ùeefo cesje ceve Fmes Deheceeve kesâ ¤he ceW mJeerkeâej ve keâjs, lees efHeâj Yeuee ceQ kewâmes Deheceeefvele ngDee? ceQves keäÙee Dehevee kegâÚ jKee nw? osn-ceve-ØeeCe – meye lees "ekegâj kesâ ßeer ÛejCeeW ceW mecee|hele keâj Ûegkeâe ntB~ JeneB Yeues-yegjs, ceeve-Deheceeve keâe keâesF& mLeeve veneR nes mekeâlee~ cesjs efueS efkeâmeer Øekeâej keâer efÛevlee cele keâjes~’’22

  1. ‘mJeeceerpeerj mce=efle mebÛeÙeve’ «evLe kesâ Devegmeej efpeme meceÙe Ùen yeeleÛeerle ngF&, Gme meceÙe mJeeceer meejoevevo veoer kesâ efkeâveejs Deewj kegâceejer cewkeäueeG[ mšercej kesâ Thej KeÌ[er LeeR~
  2. yeBieuee ceeefmekeâ ‘GodyeesOeve’ kesâ ßeerceeB Meleeyoer Debkeâ ceW mJeeceer DeelceØekeâeMeevevo efueefKele ‘ceele=mcejCes’ uesKe, he=. 156
  3. GodyeesOeve (yeBieuee ceeefmekeâ), Je<e& 68, mebKÙee 12, he=. 665

otmeje Â°evle~ Gve efoveeW ßeerceeB keâesÙeueheeÌ[e kesâ peieocyee Deeßece ceW efveJeeme keâj jner LeeR~ ceuesefjÙee kesâ Øekeâeshe mes G"keâj GvneWves DeVeheLÙe cee$e uesvee DeejcYe efkeâÙee Lee~ ßeerceeB kesâ mJeemLÙe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW efÛeeqvlele neskeâj mJeeceer meejoevevo leLee Deewj Yeer kegâÚ ueesie keâesÙeueheeÌ[e kesâ Deeßece ceW "njs ngS Les~ ceeB kesâ Skeâ mebvÙeemeer efMe<Ùe uecyes Demex lekeâ ceuesefjÙee mes keâ° Yeesieves kesâ yeeo peueJeeÙeg-heefjJele&ve kesâ efueS keâefšnej ieÙes Les Deewj Skeâ [e@keäšj ieg®YeeF& kesâ Iej ceW "njs Les~ DeelebkeâJeeoer efiejesn keâe nesves kesâ mevosn ceW hegefueme GvnW efiejHeäleej keâjvee Ûeenleer Leer~ [e@keäšj yeeyet ves mJeÙeb peceevele oskeâj meeOeg keâes cegòeâ jKeJeeÙee~ hegefueme keâer vepejyevoer ceW Jes meeOeg ßeerceeB keâe oMe&ve keâjves keâesÙeueheeÌ[e DeeÙes~ ceeB GvnW osKekeâj yeÌ[er ØemeVe LeeR~ hejvleg Gve efoveeW keâesÙeueheeÌ[e Deeßece hej hegefueme keâer keâÌ[er vepej Leer, FmeefueS DevÙe meeOeg Fme hej ØemeVe veneR nes mekesâ~ Gve ueesieeW ves Gve meeOeg keâes keâefšnej ueewš peeves keâer meueen oer~ Ùen megvekeâj ceeB og:KehetJe&keâ jesves ueieeR~ efMe<Ùe Yeer ceeB keâer mvesn-Deekegâuelee osKekeâj jes jns Les~ ‘‘"ekegâj keâer FÛÚe mes pees nesvee nw ngDee keâjs, hejvleg cesje yesše ÙeneR cesjs heeme ner jnsiee’’

– ceeB kesâ Ssmes DeefYeØeeÙe kesâ yeejs ceW megvekeâj meye ueesie yeÌ[er keâef"veeF& ceW heÌ[s~ DeeefKejkeâej Gve meeOeg ves Yeer ceeB kesâ heeme peekeâj GvnW mecePeekeâj yeleeÙee efkeâ keâefšnej ve ueewšves hej Gve Ghekeâejer [e@keäšj kesâ yeÌ[s mebkeâš ceW heÌ[ peeves keâer mecYeeJevee nw~ meye kegâÚ megveves kesâ yeeo mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer Yeer Ssmeer ner FÛÚe peevekeâj ßeerceeB mencele ngFË~ ØelÙe#eoMeea mJeeceer meejosMeevevo ves efueKee nw, ‘‘DeeefKejkeâej Deewj keâesF& GheeÙe ve osKekeâj ceelee-heg$e oesveeW ves ner DeeBKeeW mes Deßeg yeneles ngS Skeâ-otmejs mes efJeoe ueer~’’23

1897 F&. kesâ ØeejcYe ceW mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo keâer ØesjCeeefie> ves efveefõleØeeÙe mJeosMeJeeefmeÙeeW keâes PekeâPeesj efoÙee Lee~ Gve ueesieeW ves mJeeceerpeer kesâ cegKe mes ‘cesjer ›eâeeqvlekeâejer Ùeespevee’ Meer<e&keâ Yee<eCe megvee Lee, hej mecePe veneR mekesâ Les efkeâ keäÙee keâjCeerÙe nw~ Gvekesâ hegve: levõeceie> nesves kesâ hetJe& ner osMe keâer efJeefYeVe he$e-heef$ekeâeDeeW ceW mJeeceerpeer Éeje ØeJee|lele mesJeekeâeÙe& – cege|Meoeyeeo efpeues ceW Dekeâeue-heerefÌ[leeW kesâ yeerÛe mebvÙeeefmeÙeeW Éeje mesJee keâe meceeÛeej heÌ{keâj yengle-mes mJeosMeJeeefmeÙeeW keâer Ûeslevee ueewš DeeÙeer Deewj Gve ueesieeW ves mJeeceer efJeJeskeâevevo leLee Gvekesâ mevosMe kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW veÙes efmejs mes meesÛevee meerKee~ FOej ‘Dece=le-yeepeej heef$ekeâe’ ves Iees<eCee keâer efkeâ Meleeyoer keâe ye=nòece Dekeâeue YeejleJeeefmeÙeeW keâe «eeme keâjves keâes GÅele nw~ kegâÚ keâeue yeeo ner ef[iJeer meenye ves efnmeeye keâjkesâ efoKeeÙee efkeâ efheÚues 107 Je<eeX kesâ oewjeve ÙegæeW ceW efpeleves ueesie cejs nQ, YeejleJe<e& ceW 19 Je<eeX kesâ Dekeâeue kesâ oewjeve Gmekesâ Ûeejiegves ueesie cej Ûegkesâ nQ~ Dekeâeue, huesie, efJemetefÛekeâe, ceuesefjÙee, FbHeäuegSbpee Deeefo ceneceeefjÙeeW mes osMeJeeefmeÙeeW keâer ce=lÙeg leLee DeOe&ce=leeW kesâ Deele&veeo ves Deb«espeer Meemeve keâe cegKeewše nše efoÙee Lee~ Fmekesâ hetJe& DeeÙe&meceepe, yeÇeÿemeceepe leLee hegjeves F&meeF& efceMeveefjÙeeW kesâ mesJeekeâeÙe& keâer leguevee ceW jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve kesâ

23. ßeer ßeerceeÙesj mce=eflekeâLee (yeBieuee «ebLe), le=leerÙe meb., he==. 171

178 mJeeceer meejoevevo

1918 F&. keâe meeue~ efJeefYeVe DebÛeueeW mes FbHeäuegSbpee keâer ceneceejer, yeeÌ{ leLee Dekeâeue mes heerefÌ[leeW keâer cece&Yesoer keâLeeSB mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ keâeveeW lekeâ hengBÛeves ueieeR~ Fme hej Jes efJeÛeefuele nes G"s~ GvneWves peÙejeceyeešer ceW ßeerceeB keâes Skeâ megoerIe& he$e efueKekeâj GÌ[ermee kesâ DekeâeueheerefÌ[leeW kesâ ogKe-keâ°eW keâe JeCe&ve keâjles ngS Gvekesâ DeYeeJeeW keâer leguevee ceW efceMeve

25. GodyeesOeve (yeBieuee ceeefmekeâ), Je<e& 30, mebKÙee 12, he=. 720

180 mJeeceer meejoevevo

keâer meneÙelee keâer Deuhelee keâer yeele efueKeer~ GvneWves ØeeLe&vee keâer efkeâ ogKeer leLee YetKes ueesieeW keâe keâ° otj nes peeÙe~ Ùen he$e heÌ{s peeves hej ßeerceeB keâer DeeBKeW Yej DeeÙeeR Deewj Jes keâelej keâC" mes keân G"eR, ‘‘"ekegâj, ueesieeW keâe ogKe-keâ° Deye osKe-megve veneR mekeâleer~ Gvekeâer heerÌ[e keâes otj keâjes~’’ LeesÌ[er osj yeeo GvneWves JeneB GheeqmLele ØeyeesOe yeeyet mes keâne, ‘‘legceves Mejled keâe ùoÙe osKee? ceevees veeie-Jeemegkeâer nw – peneB Yeer Je<ee& nesleer nw, cesje Mejled JeneR Úlejer leeve oslee nw~ Mejled efkeâlevee oefjÙeeefoue Deeoceer nw! peerJeeW keâe ogKe osKekeâj Gmekesâ ØeeCe jes G"les nQ~ Jen efkeâleves ner ueesieeW keâe heeueve keâj jne nw, DeVeoeve keâj jne nw, ceevees heeuevenej nw – Ssmee keâesF& otmeje veneR efceuesiee~ "ekegâj! meyekeâes osves kesâ efueS Gmekesâ oesveeW neLe Yej oes~’’26 DeVe-JeŒe leLee oJeeFÙeeW keâe DeYeeJe otj keâjves kesâ efueS keâceeaieCe ÛeejeW Deesj oewÌ[ heÌ[s~ Gme Je<e& mJeeceer legjerÙeevevo leLee mJeeceer Øe%eevevo efÛeefkeâlmee kesâ efueS GodyeesOeve-YeJeve ceW "njs ngS Les, peÙejeceyeešer ceW ßeerceeB yeejcyeej yeerceejer mes Dee›eâevle nes jner LeeR Deewj FOej mJeeceer Øesceevevo ves FbHeäuegSbpee kesâ Øekeâeshe mes 20 pegueeF& keâes Deheveer Fnueeruee keâe mebJejCe keâj efueÙee~ Ùen meye meBYeeueles ngS Yeer meejoevevo peer ves mesJeekeâeÙe& keâes vesle=lJe Øeoeve efkeâÙee Lee~ Gme meceÙe GvnW efJeßeece ve Lee, Mejerj ceW LekeâeJeš ve Leer Deewj ceve ceW Yeer DeJemeeo ve Lee~ meeiej keâer Gòeeue lejbieeW kesâ meceeve Skeâ kesâ yeeo Skeâ keâle&JÙe Gvekesâ meeceves Deeles pee jns Les Deewj Jes Yeer efnceeueÙe kesâ meceeve DeÛeue-Dešue YeeJe mes meejs Ieele-ØeefleIeele meBYeeueles pee jns Les~ Fme Øekeâej GvneWves Meevle YeeJe mes Deheves meejs keâle&JÙeeW keâe mecheeove efkeâÙee~

1919 F&. kesâ Deòetâyej mes 1920 F&. keâer peveJejer lekeâ hetJeea yebieeue kesâ {ekeâe, Heâjerohegj, yeejermeeue leLee Keguevee efpeueeW ceW Ûe›eâJeele mes #eefle«emle 425 «eeceeW kesâ ueesieeW keâer mesJee keâer ieÙeer~ Deveskeâ efJelejCe-kesâvõeW mes 3370 ceve ÛeeJeue leLee 3195 veÙes JeŒeeW keâe efJelejCe efkeâÙee ieÙee~ 2157 jesefieÙeeW keâer efÛeefkeâlmee keâer ieÙeer Deewj 560 IejeW kesâ efvecee&Ce nsleg Oeve efoÙee ieÙee~ #eefle«emle efveOe&ve Yeõ-heefjJeej kesâ ueesieeW keâer Yeer Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee keâer ieÙeer~ Fme mesJeekeâeÙe& ceW 28 meeOeg-yeÇÿeÛeejer ueies Les Deewj kegâue efceueekeâj 24,305 ®heÙes JÙeÙe ngS Les~27

1924 F&. keâer pegueeF& mes Deòetâyej lekeâ kesâ Ûeej cenerveeW kesâ oewjeve lebpeewj, ef$eÛeveeheuueer, keâesÙecyeletj, mesuece, efyeÇefšMe ceueeyeej, keâesÛeerve leLee ef$eJesvõce kesâ 200 ieeBJeeW ceW yeeÌ{heerefÌ[leeW keâer mesJee keâer ieÙeer~ Fme DeJemej hej DevÙe meneÙeleeDeeW kesâ Deefleefjòeâ 4532 keâheÌ[eW keâe efJelejCe Deewj 7036 kegâšerjeW keâe efvecee&Ce efkeâÙee ieÙee Lee~

Deele&-heerefÌ[leeW keâe Ùen mesJeekeâeÙe& Ûeueevee keâesF& Deemeeve keâeÙe& veneR Lee~ keâYeer keâYeer

  1. mJeeceer F&Meeveevevo (yeBieuee), 5JeeB meb., he==. 84~ mJeeceer DeMes<eevevo jefÛele ‘The glimpses of a great Soul’ «evLe kesâ celeevegmeej Ùen Iešvee 1919 F&. ceW ngF& Leer~
  2. õ°JÙe – GodyeesOeve (yeBieuee ceeefmekeâ), Je<e& 22, mebKÙee 1 leLee 3~

efpeme Øekeâej keâer peefšue mecemÙeeDeeW keâe meecevee keâjvee heÌ[lee Lee, Deye Gmeer kesâ oes-Skeâ GoenjCe uesles nQ~ Gòejer yebieeue kesâ jepemeener ceW yeeÌ{ DeeÙeer ngF& nw – Ùen meceeÛeej heeles ner 8 efmelecyej 1918 keâes jepemeener kesâ veJeieeBJe Leevee#es$e keâer Deesj 8 keâceea Yespe efoÙes ieÙes~ leerve cenerveeW lekeâ 326 «eeceeW ceW mesJeekeâeÙe& Ûeuelee jne~ hejvleg JeneB keâe keâeÙe& hetje keâjves kesâ yeeo mesJekeâeW kesâ yesuetÌ[ ce" ueewš Deeves kesâ yeeo, JeneB keâer efkeâmeer efkeâmeer mebmLee ves Fme DeefYeÙeesie kesâ meeLe efceMeve keâer DeeueesÛevee DeejcYe keâj oer efkeâ JeneB mesJeekeâeÙe& yevo keâjvee GefÛele veneR ngDee~ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves meJe&meeOeejCe keâes metefÛele keâj efoÙee efkeâ ‘‘oerIe&keâeue lekeâ mesJeekeâeÙe& kesâ DevegYeJe mes efceMeve Fme yeele keâes YeueerYeeBefle peevelee nw efkeâ keâye keâewve-mee mesJeekeâeÙe& DeejcYe keâjvee nesiee Deewj keâye yevo keâjvee nesiee~ pees ueesie veÙes Glmeen kesâ meeLe Gme mesJeekeâeÙe& keâes Deewj Yeer DeefOekeâ keâeue lekeâ Ûeueevee Ûeenles neW, GvnW Fme efJe<eÙe ceW Deewj Yeer DeefOekeâ DevegYeJe Øeehle keâjves keâer DeeJeMÙekeâlee nesieer~’’ JeneB keâer efkeâmeer efkeâmeer mebmLee ves meejoevevo peer kesâ Fme JeòeâJÙe keâer Yeer meceeueesÛevee keâer~ hejvleg meejoevevo peer DeefJeÛeefuele jns~28

1921 F&. ceW efceMeve keâes Skeâ efJeefÛe$e heefjeqmLeefle kesâ yeerÛe mesJeekeâeÙe& keâe mebÛeeueve keâjvee heÌ[e Lee~ Deemeece kesâ ÛeeÙe-yeeieeveeW kesâ ueieYeie {eF& npeej kegâueer Skeâ mehleen mes ef$ehegje kesâ ÛeeBohegj ceW "njs ngS Les~ iJeeuevo nesles ngS Gve ueesieeW kesâ Deheves Deheves ieeBJe ueewš peeves keâer yeele Leer~ hejvleg jepeveweflekeâ vesleeDeeW keâe ØeÙeeme Lee efkeâ Fve kegâefueÙeeW keâes ÛeeBohegj ceW ner jeskeâkeâj mejkeâej leLee pevelee keâe OÙeeve Deekeâe|<ele efkeâÙee peeÙe~ JeneB kesâ DemJeemLÙekeâj heefjJesMe kesâ keâejCe GveceW nwpee keâe Øekeâeshe Hewâue ieÙee~ efove-hej-efove cejvesJeeueeW keâer mebKÙee ceW Je=efæ nesves ueieer~ meejoevevo peer keâes Yeer Fmekeâe efJemle=le meceeÛeej efceuee~ Gme mesJeekeâeÙe& keâer efpeccesoejer «enCe keâjvesJeeues mJeeceer Yetceevevo kesâ veece 7 petve 1921 keâes Skeâ he$e ceW meejoevevo peer ves efueKee, ‘‘legce JeneB oefjõ-veejeÙeCe keâer mesJee keâjves ieÙes nes, pees kegâÚ Deewj pewmes keâjves mes Jen mesJee nes mekesâ Jener keâjvee – jepeveerefle keâjves legce JeneB veneR ieÙes Deewj ve ner nce ueesieeW ves legcnW Gme GösMÙe mes Yespee nw~ ... cesjer FÛÚe nw efkeâ kegâefueÙeeW keâer mesJee hetjer keâjves kesâ yeeo efpelevee MeerIeÇ nes mekesâ, legce Keguevee peekeâj JeneB (Dekeâeue-heerefÌ[leeW) keâer DeJemLee osKekeâj keâeÙe& DeejcYe keâj oes~ Gmekesâ efueS pees Yeer Oeve leLee mesJekeâeW keâer pe¤jle nesieer, legcnejs efueKeles ner Yespe efoÙee peeÙeiee~ legce ueesieeW ceW mes pees ueesie Lekeâ Ûegkesâ nQ, Gvekesâ yeoues ceQ DevÙe ueesieeW keâes Yespe otBiee~’’ jepeveweflekeâ iegšyeepeer mes Deheves keâes yeÛeeles ngS efceMeve kesâ mesJekeâeW ves ÛeeBohegj ceW efJemetefÛekeâe-«emle jesefieÙeeW keâer mesJee keâer; 818 ogo&Mee«emle kegâefueÙeeW keâer Deee|Lekeâ meneÙelee keâer; 350 ueesieeW kesâ efueS iJeeuevo mes vewnešer lekeâ kesâ efueS jsuJes

28. õ°JÙe –Report of the Ramakrishna Math & Mission convention, 1926, p. 254; leLee GodyeesOeve, Je<e& 68, mebKÙee 12, he=. 689-90

182 mJeeceer meejoevevo

Fme Øekeâej mJeeceer meejoevevo kesâ vesle=lJe ceW Deele&mesJee keâer pees hejcheje DeejcYe ngF& Leer, cetuele: Gmeer keâe DevegmejCe keâjles ngS Deepe ce" leLee efceMeve DelÙevle ye=nled mlej hej ogie&leeW kesâ ØeeLeefcekeâ jenle leLee heerefÌ[leeW kesâ hegveJee&me keâe mesJeekeâeÙe& Ûeuee jne nw~ lÙeeie SJeb mesJee keâe DeeoMe& ner Yeejle keâer MeeÕele YeeJevee nw~ Gme ceneved DeeoMe& kesâ Éeje DevegØeeefCele mesJekeâeW kesâ mesJeekeâeÙe& ves efveo&Ùe peÌ[ØeeÙe meceepe-JÙeJemLee ceW Skeâ veÙes ØeeCe keâe mebÛeej efkeâÙee nw~

mebIe keâer ØemeejCe #ecelee Yeer Gmekeâer peerJeveer-Meefòeâ keâe heefjÛeeÙekeâ nw~ Fme ceeheoC[ mes efJeÛeej keâjves hej nce osKeles nQ efkeâ ce" leLee efceMeve Dehes#eeke=âle DelÙevle õgle ieefle mes De«emej ngDee Lee~ YeejleJe<e& kesâ efJeefYeVe DebÛeueeW leLee efJeosMeeW ceW Yeer pees kesâvõ ieef"le ngS nQ, GveceW mes efkeâmeer kesâ Yeer pevce leLee Fefleneme hej ÛeÛee& keâjves hej mecePee pee mekeâlee nw efkeâ ØelÙeskeâ kesâ heerÚs "ekegâj-ceeB-mJeeceerpeer kesâ YeeJeeoMe& keâer Øeyeue ØesjCee efJeÅeceeve Leer~ Fve mecemle kesâvõeW Ùee mebmLeeDeeW ceW yengle-mes ce" Éeje Øesef<ele mebvÙeeefmeÙeeW Éeje ieef"le ngS Deewj yeekeâer Gmeer YeeJeeoMe& mes DevegØeeefCele YeòeâeW Éeje ieef"le nesves kesâ yeeo ce" Ùee efceMeve mes Ùegòeâ nes ieÙes~ meb#eshe ceW keâne pee mekeâlee nw efkeâ mJeeceerpeer kesâ peerJevekeâeue ceW yesuetÌ[ ce" kesâ Deefleefjòeâ cege|Meoeyeeo ceW DeveeLeeßece, ceõeme ceW ce", JeejeCemeer ceW DeÉwleeßece leLee mesJeeßece, ceeÙeeJeleer ceW DeÉwleeßece, keâveKeue ceW mesJeeßece leLee Fueeneyeeo ceW mesJeeßece – yeerpe kesâ ¤he ceW DeejcYe ngS Les~ 1899 F&. ceW mJeeceer efJejpeevevo leLee mJeeceer ØekeâeMeevevo keâer ØeÛeejÙee$ee kesâ yeeo {ekeâe ceW efceMeve kesâvõ keâer ØeejeqcYekeâ lewÙeejer ngF& Leer~ heef§ece ceW Yeer vÙegÙeeke&â leLee kewâueerHeâese|veÙee ceW oes kesâvõeW keâer Meg®Deele ngF& Leer~

184 mJeeceer meejoevevo

keâce&#es$e keâe ØemeejCe leLee meJe&oe Gme Øemeej keâes cetue GösMÙe kesâ DeefYecegKeer yeveeS jKeves ceW efpeve heLe-ØeoMe&vekeâejer vesleeDeeW ves Fme keâeue ceW Deelceeslmeie& efkeâÙee Lee, GveceW ØecegKe mes mJeeceer meejoevevo~ Gvekesâ yeejs ceW "erkeâ ner keâne ieÙee nw, ‘‘An indefatigable worker and easily the most balanced man in the whole Order.’’ Ghejesòeâ ØelÙeskeâ kesâvõ ›eâceMe: mLeeefhele ngDee, hejvleg keâeHeâer ØeÙeemeeW kesâ yeeJepeto 1912 F&. ceW Ùen mebmLee yevo nes ieÙeer~

Øemeej keâer Ùen Oeeje efvejvlej Ûeueleer jner~ Devlele: 1926 F&. ceW ce" leLee efceMeve kesâ cenemeccesueve kesâ meceÙe lekeâ Fmekesâ kesâvõeW keâer mebKÙee 61 lekeâ pee hengBÛeer Leer~32 efJeosMeeW ceW Decesefjkeâe leLee ceuesefMeÙee ceW 7 kesâvõeW ves mLeeÙeer ¤he OeejCe keâj efueÙee Lee~

Ghejesòeâ kesâvõeW keâe pevce efkeâmeer kesâvõerÙe Ùeespevee kesâ Devegmeej veneR ngDee~ kegâÚ IešveeDeeW kesâ mebÙeesie mes DeLeJee Skeâ Ùee DeefOekeâ ueesieeW kesâ DeocÙe ØeÙeeme mes Skeâ Skeâ Deeßece keâe GodYeJe ngDee Lee~ Skeâ efove yeeleÛeerle kesâ oewjeve mJeeceer meejoevevo ves keâne Lee, ‘‘Skeâ Skeâ Deeßece keâer me=ef<š kewâmes ngF& nw peeveles nes? mecYeJe nw efkeâ legce keâneR keâece mes Ùee YeüceCe keâjves ieÙes nes, mLeeve hemevo Dee peeves mes mecYeJe nw JeneR Deeßece yevee yew"s~ Gmekesâ yeeo ueesieeW keâer DeeJeMÙekeâlee mecePekeâj ce" keâes metefÛele efkeâÙee~ mebÛeeuekeâeW ceW mes DeefOekeâebMe keâer menceefle

32. ce" leLee efceMeve kesâ kesâvõeW keâes Deueie Deueie efoKeeÙee ieÙee nw~

nesves hej Deeßece keâes peejer jKevee efveef§ele nes ieÙee~ efHeâj Deeßece keâes Ûeueeves kesâ efueS Deeoceer Yeer Yespevee nesiee Deewj keâeÙe& Yeer keâjves keâes keânvee nesiee~’’33 Fme YeeJe keâe JÙeefle›eâce Yeer osKeves ceW Deelee nw~ mJeeceerpeer ves ceneheg®<e cenejepe keâes Skeâ Deeßece ieÌ{ves kesâ efueS JeejeCemeer Yespee Lee, mJeeceer keâuÙeeCeevevo keâes Skeâ mesJeekesâvõ yeveekeâj meeOegDeeW keâer mesJee keâjves nefjÉej Yespee Lee Deewj mJeeceer jeceke=â<Ceevevo keâes oef#eCe ceW Skeâ kesâvõ yeveeves kesâ efueS ceõeme Yespee Lee~ efHeâj osKe-oeKekeâj hemevo kesâ Devegmeej peceerve Kejeroves kesâ yeeo ceeÙeeJeleer ceW DeÉwleeßece keâer mLeehevee keâer ieÙeer Leer~ Dekeâeue-heerefÌ[leeW keâer mesJee kesâ heefjefMe° ¤he ceW cenguee ceW Skeâ DeveeLeeßece keâer mLeehevee ngF& Leer~ Jewmes veÙes Deeßece yeveeves DeLeJee otmejeW Éeje yeveeÙes ieÙes Deeßece keâes ce" mes mebÙegòeâ keâjles meceÙe mebÛeeuekeâeW keâe ceeheoC[ Skeâ ner jne keâjlee Lee~ Skeâ GoenjCe uesles nQ –

megjsve yeeyet (yeeo ceW mJeeceer efveJexoevevo) keâe@uespe kesâ efJeÅeee|LeÙeeW kesâ efueS Skeâ Úe$eeJeeme Ûeuee jns Les~ Skeâ efove mJeeceer meejoevevo ves Gvemes keâne, ‘‘Gmes Dekesâues Dekesâues Yeuee keâye lekeâ ÛeueeDeesies? Gmes efceMeve mes meeLe mebÙegòeâ keäÙeeW veneR keâj osles?’’ megjsve yeeyet ves Gòej efoÙee, ‘‘cenejepe, megvee nw efkeâ efyevee YeJeve leLee hetBpeerJeeues efkeâmeer kesâvõ keâe efceMeve kesâ meeLe mebÙeespeve veneR neslee~ Fmekeâe lees DeYeer kegâÚ Yeer veneR nw~’’ Fme hej mJeeceer meejoevevo yeesues, ‘‘nce ueesie ®heÙes-hewmes, peceerve-peeÙeoeo veneR osKeles~ nce Deeoceer osKeles nQ~ legce Devle lekeâ ÂÌ{leehetJe&keâ ueies lees jn mekeâesies ve?’’ megjsve yeeyet ves hetÚe, ‘‘Fmemes cesjs DeeOÙeeeeqlcekeâ peerJeve keâes keâesF& #eefle lees veneR hengBÛesieer?’’ mJeeceer meejoevevo ves GvnW DeeÕemle keâjles ngS keâne, ‘‘veneR, Gmes nce osKe ueWies~ legce YeeJeMegefæ yeveeÙes jKe mekeâesies ve? efpemeceW YeeJeMegefæ veneR nw, Gmekeâe JeneB Yeer kegâÚ ve nesiee~ Deewj efpemeceW Jen nw, Gmekeâe ÙeneB Yeer nesiee~ legcnW YeeJe keâes yeveeÙes jKevee nesiee~’’ ÙegJekeâ megjsvõveeLe ves keâne, ‘‘ceQ ØeÙeeme keâ¤Biee~’’ mJeeceer meejoevevo yeesues, ‘‘yeme, Fmeer mes nes peeÙeiee~’’34 kegâÚ efoveeW yeeo ner Úe$eeJeeme efceMeve mes mebÙegòeâ nes ieÙee Deewj Gmekeâe veece ngDee – ‘jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve keâuekeâòee efJeÅeeLeea ie=n’~

keâF& kesâvõeW keâer, efJeMes<ekeâj YeòeâeW Éeje ieef"le kegâÚ kesâvõeW keâer Dekeâeue-ce=lÙeg nes ieÙeer Leer~ efHeâj efkeâmeer efkeâmeer kesâvõ ceW keâce& keâe mebkegâÛeve Yeer DeJeMÙecYeeJeer nes G"e Lee~ Fme efJe<eÙe ceW veslee mJeeceer meejoevevo keâer YeeJevee efyeukegâue mhe° Leer~ GvneWves Skeâ mebvÙeemeer keâes efueKee Lee, ‘‘pees keâeÙe& DeejcYe efkeâÙee ieÙee nw, Gmes yevo keâjvee cegPes keâYeer Yeer DeÛÚe veneR ueielee~ ... keâYeer keâYeer osKeves ceW Deelee nw efkeâ nce ueesie efpeme keâeÙe& keâes keâYeer veneR Ûeue mekeâvesJeeuee mecePeles nQ, Gmes Yeer ceeÙee ceW heÌ[keâj KeeRÛeles jnvee Ûeenles nQ~ Ssmes ceeceueeW ceW Gme keâeÙe& keâes ÚesÌ[ osvee ner meÛÛeer Jeerjlee Deewj keâle&JÙe nw~ nce ueesie mJeeOeerve nQ, YeieJeeve kesâ DebMe

  1. ßeer ßeermeejoevevo-Øemebie, he=. 100
  2. GodyeesOeve, Je<e& 68, mebKÙee 12, he=. 685

186 mJeeceer meejoevevo

leLee heg$e nQ, nce ueesie Yeuee keäÙeeW Fme Øekeâej keâce& kesâ yevOeve ceW heÌ[ves peeÙeWies? – meJe&oe Ùener YeeJe ueskeâj keâeÙe& keâjvee, mebmeejer yeæ peerJe kesâ meceeve veneR~’’35 mebvÙeemeer nes Ùee ie=nmLe, pees keâesF& Yeer Deeßece keâe mebie"ve keâjs, ßeerjeceke=â<Ce mebIe ceW Gmekesâ efueS meejoevevo peer Éeje Ieesef<ele Fmeer veerefle keâe DevegmejCe keâjvee GefÛele nesiee~

efJeefYeVe ueesieeW kesâ celeecele keâer hejJeen ve keâjles ngS, mJeeceer meejoevevo ves "ekegâjmJeeceerpeer kesâ DeeoMe& keâes ner OeÇgJeleejs kesâ ¤he ceW mJeerkeâej efkeâÙee Lee~ Jes keâne Yeer keâjles Les, ‘‘"ekegâj-mJeeceerpeer keâer Deesj osKeles ngS DeepeerJeve keâece efkeâÙes pee jne ntB; ueesie keäÙee keânles nQ Ùee veneR keânles, Fme lejHeâ OÙeeve osves keâer Hegâjmele cegPes keâYeer veneR efceueer~’’ hejvleg "ekegâjmJeeceerpeer keâe DeeoMe& ner meye kegâÚ nw – Gvekeâer Fmeer Øekeâej keâer OÙeeve-OeejCee kesâ yeerÛe ner Gvekesâ vesle=lJe keâer meHeâuelee efveefnle Leer~ Gvekesâ Ûeefj$e keâer kegâÚ ogue&Ye efJeMes<eleeSB, meyeue peerJeveyeesOe leLee mebIe kesâ GösMÙe kesâ Deveg¤he ÙeLeeLe&Jeeoer, meenmehetCe&, meerOes-meeos leLee F&ÕejefveYe&j keâce&veerefle keâe DevegmejCe ner Gvekeâer DemeeOeejCe meHeâuelee keâe jnmÙe Lee~ Gvekesâ Ûeeefjef$ekeâ JewefMe°Ÿe ceW mes ÙeneB mcejCeerÙe nw – Gvekeâer Dee%eekeâeefjlee, keâ°eW keâer hejJeen ve keâjles ngS DeOÙeJemeeÙehetJe&keâ keâce& keâjvee, keâce&efvehegCelee, menevegYetefle leLee efveŠmJeeLe& Øesce~ Deewj Gvekesâ Éeje Devegmeefjle keâce&veerefleÙeeW ceW mes efvece>efueefKele efJeMes<e ¤he mes efJeÛeejCeerÙe nQ –

(keâ) efpeme Øekeâej Jes keâce& kesâ meeOÙe leLee meeOeve kesâ efJe<eÙe ceW Megælee keâer j#ee keâjkesâ Ûeueles Les, Jewmes ner Jes mecemle keâecekeâepe kesâ Yeerlej ue#Ùe keâer Skeâe«elee keâer Deesj Yeer OÙeeve jKeles Les~ Skeâ Â°evle efueÙee peeÙe~ Gve efoveeW mJeeceer DeYeÙeevevo (Yejle cenejepe) ceeÙeeJeleer Deeßece kesâ keâceea Les~ Gvekeâer efkeâmeer mebmLee ceW meeqcceefuele neskeâj ke=âef<eefJe%eeve keâe DeYÙeeme keâjves keâer FÛÚe Leer~ cenejepe keâer efMe<Ùee ßeerceleer kegâkeâ kesâ Éeje Gvekesâ he#e ceW Jekeâeuele keâjves hej GvneWves efueKee, ‘‘I have no objection in Bharat's learning agriculture if he does not forget the ideal for which he donned the Gerua cloth. I am afraid he might do so, still, if he remains long out of touch with his brother monks.’’36 ÙeneB mJeeceer meejoevevo keâe JeòeâJÙe mhe° nesves mes JÙeeKÙee DeveeJeMÙekeâ nw~

(Ke) meYeer keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ Øeefle GvnW ßeæe, efJeÕeeme leLee Øesce Lee~ otmejeW hej efJeÕeeme keâjkesâ GvneWves Gve ueesieeW ceW mes efJeÕemle keâe|ceÙeeW keâer me=ef° keâer Leer, mJeeOeervelee oskeâj37 Gve

  1. he$eceeuee (yeBieuee «ebLe), efÉleerÙe meb., he==. 26
  2. JeejeCemeer mes mJeeceer meejoevevo Éeje 18/2/1925 keâes efueKee ieÙee he$e~
  3. meejoevevo peer ves 19/4/1919 keâes Skeâ ce"eOÙee#e kesâ veece Deheves he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘ceveg<Ùe keâer Deelcee efÛej-mJeeOeerve nesves kesâ keâejCe ner Gmekesâ ceve ceW meye Øekeâej keâer mJeeOeervelee Øeehle keâjves keâer FÛÚe Gefole nesleer nw~ ÙeLeeLe& veslee keâYeer Yeer Gmekeâer mJeeOeervelee Øeehle keâjves keâer Fme FÛÚe ceW yeeOee veneR hengBÛeeles; yeequkeâ kesâJeue Ùener ØeÙeeme keâjles nQ efkeâ mJeeOeervelee Øeehle keâjves kesâ yeeo Jen Gmekeâe meogheÙeesie keâj mekesâ~’’

ueesieeW keâes Deheveer Deheveer ØeefleYee keâe efJekeâeme keâjves ceW meneÙelee keâer Leer Deewj efHeâj Dehevee efveŠmJeeLe& Øesce oskeâj GvnW mebIe leLee Fmekesâ DebieeW keâes Dehevee yevee uesvee efmeKeeÙee Lee~ efvepe&ve ceW peekeâj meeOeve-Yepeve keâjves keâer Deekeâeb#ee Deewj mesJeekeâce& keâer ¤Ì{ JeemleefJekeâlee kesâ yeerÛe keâe Deeheele-efJejesOeer YeeJe ØeeÙe: efmej G"eÙee keâjlee nw; Fmekeâe meceeOeeve GvneWves Deheves ner peerJeve keâes Â°evle kesâ ¤he ceW jKekeâj efkeâÙee Lee~ keâce&#es$e ceW keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ yeerÛe nesvesJeeueer ieuele-Heânceer, ceveesceeefuevÙe Deeefo mecemÙeeDeeW keâes cenejepe Deheves JÙeefòeâlJe kesâ ceeOegÙe& kesâ Éeje nue keâj uesles Les~ Fmekesâ HeâuemJe¤he, Gvekeâer DeemLee mes heg° keâe|ceÙeeW ves Deheveer Dee%eekeâeefjlee, leLee efve‰ehetCe& mesJee Éeje Gme DeemLee keâes GefÛele ceÙee&oe Øeoeve keâer Leer~ Gvekesâ vesle=lJe kesâ DeOeerve Deveskeâ keâe|ceÙeeW kesâ Deevleefjkeâ peerJeve ceW heefjJele&ve DeeÙee Lee~ Gvekeâer mvesnOeeje ceW mveele Skeâ mebvÙeemeer ves efueKee nw, ‘‘jeceke=â<Ce efceMeve keâe meefÛeJe nesves kesâ keâejCe ceQ Gve (mJeeceer meejoevevo) keâe Dee%eekeâejer veneR ngDee Lee, yeequkeâ Gvekesâ Demeerce Øesce ves ner cegPes JeMeerYetle keâj efueÙee Lee~ kesâJeue ceQ ner veneR, jeceke=â<Ce mebIe kesâ efpeve DevÙe mebvÙeeefmeÙeeW keâes Yeer Gvekesâ mebmeie& ceW Deeves keâe meewYeeiÙe efceuee Lee, Jes meYeer Skeâcele mes mJeerkeâej keâjWies efkeâ Gvekesâ Øesce keâer DeocÙe Meefòeâ ves ner Gve ueesieeW kesâ Yeer ùoÙe hej DeefOekeâej keâj efueÙee Lee~’’38

(ie) Gvekeâer keâce&kegâMeuelee leLee meebie"efvekeâ meeceLÙe& kesâ heerÚs Gvekeâer meÛÛeeF& Je efve‰e, Gvekesâ ceve leLee cegKe keâer Skeâlee, otmejs JÙeefòeâ kesâ Øeefle Demeerce menevegYetefle Deewj menpemejue F&ÕejefveYe&j Âef°keâesCe efJeÅeceeve Lee~ GvneWves keâe|ceÙeeW mes Deheves Øeefle Dee%eekeâeefjlee keâer Dehes#ee ve keâjkesâ, GveceW GösMÙe kesâ Øeefle efve‰e, mebIe kesâ Øeefle cecelee Deewj "ekegâj kesâ Thej efveYe&jlee ueeves keâe ØeÙeeme efkeâÙee Lee~ Skeâ ie=ner keâceea kesâ ØeMve keâe Gòej osles ngS meejoevevo peer ves 12 efmelecyej 1924 keâes efueKee Lee, ‘‘legceves keâce&keâewMeue DeLeJee Gme meefceefle kesâ efueS Oeve Skeâ$e keâjves keâe GheeÙe peeveves keâer FÛÚe JÙeòeâ keâer nw~ Fme efJe<eÙe ceW efkeâmeer Øekeâej keâe DehetJe& keâewMeue cegPes %eele veneR nw, Dele: kewâmes yeleeTBiee? ceQ peye keâYeer efpeme Yeer keâeÙe& ceW ueiee ntB, Gmes peer-peeve mes hetje keâjves keâe ØeÙeeme efkeâÙee nw Deewj Oeve keâe DeYeeJe nesves hej ueesieeW mes meerOes-meeos {bie mes keâne nw efkeâ Fme keâeÙe& kesâ efueS Fleves Oeve keâer DeeJeMÙekeâlee nw, Ùeefo kegâÚ os mekeâles nes lees os oes – yeme Flevee ner~ legce Yeer Ssmee ner keâjkesâ osKe mekeâles nes~’’39

(Ie) mJeeceerpeer keâne keâjles Les – ‘efmejoej lees mejoej’~ meejoevevo peer ves 18 Deiemle (1918) keâes Skeâ he$e ceW efueKee Lee, ‘‘mJeeceerpeer keâne keâjles Les efkeâ pees JÙeefòeâ mJeÙeb keâer meyekesâ oeme kesâ ¤he ceW ÙeLeeLe& OeejCee keâj mekeâlee nw, Jener meceÙe Deeves hej veslee yeve mekeâlee nw, otmeje veneR~’’ mJeeceer meejoevevo mJeÙeb keâes mebIe kesâ meYeer ueesieeW keâe oeme mecePeles Les

188 mJeeceer meejoevevo

Deewj Ùener YeeJe Gvekesâ DeeÛejCe mes Yeer DeefYeJÙeòeâ neslee Lee~ Skeâ Iešvee nw~ 1919 F&. kesâ veJecyej keâe cenervee Lee~ meejoevevo peer JeejeCemeer ceW Les~ Skeâ efove Skeâ yeÇÿeÛeejer ves GvnW metefÛele efkeâÙee efkeâ Gmekesâ Thej keâeÙe& keâe DelÙeefOekeâ yeesPe nw Deewj Iej Iej Ietcekeâj mesJeeßece kesâ efueS cegef°efYe#ee Skeâ$e keâjvee Deye Gmekesâ Éeje mecYeJe veneR nes mekesâiee~ efyevee kegâÚ keâns meejoevevo peer ÛeeJeue keâer Peesueer neLe ceW ueskeâj Deeies yeÌ{ ieÙes~40 yeÇÿeÛeejer keâe DeefYeceeve GÌ[ve-Út nes ieÙee Deewj Jen cenejepe mes #ecee ceeBiekeâj Deheves efvee|o° keâeÙe& ceW ueie ieÙee~

(*) ßeerjeceke=â<Ce kesâ heeohe©eeW ceW ceve keâes hetjer leewj mes mecee|hele keâj osvee Deewj keâecekeâepe kesâ Éeje Gvekesâ Thej hetCe& efveYe&jlee keâe Depe&ve – Ùener Gvekeâer meHeâuelee keâe jnmÙe Lee~ Gvekeâe ÂÌ{ efJeÕeeme Lee efkeâ Ùeefo keâeÙe& "ekegâj keâe nw, lees Jen DeJeMÙe "erkeâ "erkeâ mecheVe nesiee~ Deewj hetjer Ûes°e kesâ yeeo Yeer efJeHeâue nesves hej Jes keânles, ‘‘cesjs efueS "ekegâj hej efveYe&jlee leLee efJeÕeeme keâes eqmLej jKekeâj ÛegheÛeehe yew"s jnvee ner GefÛele nw~’’41 Gvekesâ he$eeW mes mebkeâefuele Ghejesòeâ YeeJeeW mes Devegjbefpele kegâÚ GheosMe nce ÙeneB vecetves kesâ ¤he ceW Øemlegle keâjles nQ –

(keâ) ‘‘Ùeefo meYeer (keâe|ceÙeeW) ceW Deeßece kesâ Øeefle ‘DehevelJe yegefæ’ ve GlheVe keâj mekeâes, lees efHeâj kesâJeue keâ"esj efveÙece yeveekeâj ner Deeßece keâes keâYeer Ûeuee veneR mekeâesies~ ›eâesOe, veejepeieer, efkeâmeer keâer ieuleer keâes ve menvee, ceve-cegKe keâes Skeâ ve jKe heevee Deewj meJeexheefj Øesce kesâ mLeeve hej yegefæ kesâ Éeje meyekeâes JeMe ceW jKeves keâe ØeÙeeme – yeÌ[er Deemeeveer mes Deeßece-Yebie keâe keâejCe nes peelee nw~ nce ueesieeW ceW Jen meye ØeefJe° nes jne nw Ùee veneR, Fme efJe<eÙe ceW efJeMes<e OÙeeve jKevee~’’ (yeBieuee efoveebkeâ 30 ßeeJeCe 1325 keâes efueefKele)

(Ke) ‘‘ßeerjeceke=â<Ce mes Deevleefjkeâ ØeeLe&vee nw efkeâ legce ueesieeW kesâ Devoj keâneR mJeeLe&hejlee ØeefJe° neskeâj Øesce kesâ yevOeve keâes efÚVe ve keâjs~’’ (yeBieuee efo. 9 Yeeõ 1325 keâes efueefKele)

(ie) ‘‘Gve (menkeâceea) ueesieeW kesâ ceve ceW Ùeefo Ùen OeejCee Skeâ yeej ÂÌ{ nes peeÙe efkeâ ce" ceW jnkeâj Gvekesâ efueS mJeeOeerve YeeJe mes keâesF& keâeÙe& keâjvee DemecYeJe nw, lees Jes ueesie Yeeieves keâe ØeÙeeme keâjWies~ Skeâcee$e Øesce kesâ yevOeve mes ner Jes ueesie ce" ceW nQ Deewj meejs keâeÙe& mJesÛÚehetJe&keâ keâj jns nQ (efkeâmeer kesâ Éeje yeeOÙe neskeâj veneR) – Ùener YeeJe Gve ueesieeW kesâ ceve ceW jns, Fme efJe<eÙe ceW efJeMes<e OÙeeve jKevee~’’ (19 DeØewue, 1919 keâes efueefKele he$e)

(Ie) ‘‘efpememes ceesšs Yeespeve-JeŒe mes mevleg° jnkeâj ßeer"ekegâj keâe keâeÙe& keâj mekeâes Deewj MeeeqvlehetJe&keâ efove efyelee mekeâes, Jewmee ner keâjvee~’’ (13 veJecyej, 1918 keâes efueefKele he$e) ‘‘ceQ legce ueesieeW kesâ efueS ÙeLeeLe& cebieue-keâecevee keâjlee jnlee ntB – Fmeer keâejCe efkeâ efpememes efkeâmeer Øekeâej legce ueesieeW keâer DeeÙe ceW Je=efæ nes peeÙe Deewj legce De$e+Ceer DeJemLee ceW jnkeâj ceesše Yeespeve-JeŒe heeles ngS "ekegâj keâes Deheves hetjs DevleŠkeâjCe mes hegkeâej mekeâes, Fmekesâ efueS
